prayer.description: Target does not need to breathe and ignores suffocation rules.
prayer.name: Blessing of Breath

prayer.description: Miracle of Ranald. Gain +1 Fortune point and an extra +1 Fortune point for every +2 SL. The extra points can take your overall Fortune above you maximum.
prayer.name: Stay Lucky

prayer.description: Miracle of Manann. Steal wind from the sails of a boat.
prayer.name: Becalm
prayer.target: 1 sailing vessel within Line of Sight

prayer.description: Miracle of Myrmidia.  All affected targets get +1 AP on all locations.
prayer.name: Shield of Myrmidia

prayer.description: Target heals +1 Wound.
prayer.name: Blessing of Healing

prayer.description: Target gets +10 WS.
prayer.name: Blessing of Battle

prayer.description: Weapon counts as Magical.
prayer.name: Blessing of Righteousness

prayer.description: Target gets +10 Int.
prayer.name: Blessing of Wisdom

prayer.description: Miracle of Morr. See target's Doom. After this Miracle is performed the target can acquire Talent Doom with XP.
prayer.name: Dooming

prayer.description: Miracle of Morr. A willing target gains  Unconscious Condition and will not deteriorate until the Miracle ends. During this time, target ignore any existing critical wounds, poison etc.
prayer.name: Stay Morrâ€™s Hand

prayer.description: Miracle of Rhya. Remove 1 Condition from affected targets. If that was the last Condition, they get +10 bonus to any tests on their next Turn.
prayer.name: Rhya's Succour

prayer.description: Miracle of Taal and Ringil. Gain +1 Movement and +1 Strong Legs Talent. You automatically pass all Athletics Tests to jump with at least +0 SL.
prayer.name: Leaping Stag

prayer.description: When target of this blessing next inflicts Critical Wound, roll twice and chose the higher result.
prayer.name: Blessing of Savagery

prayer.description: Target gets +10 Ag.
prayer.name: Blessing of Grace

prayer.description: Target gets +10 T.
prayer.name: Blessing of Hardiness

prayer.description: Miracle of Manann. Stuns the target by drenching it with saltwater.
prayer.name: Sea Legs

prayer.description: Miracle of Shallya. Target suffers not penalties caused by Conditions.
prayer.name: Anchorite's Endurance

prayer.description: Miracle of Taal. Summon an animal appropriate for the surrounding area. The summoned animal act according to your will.
prayer.name: King of the Wild

prayer.description: Miracle of Taal. Gain Bite (SB+3) and Weapon (SB+4) Creature Traits. There attacks count as Magical.
prayer.name: Tooth and Claw

prayer.description: Miracle of Verena and Mabyn. Your swords becomes Magical and ignores Armor. Any criminal struck in combat must take an Average (+20) Endurance to avoid Unconscious Condition that lasts Fel Bonus Rounds.
prayer.name: Sword of Justice

prayer.description:
Miracle of Verena. Gain +20 to all Int Tests, +1 Menacing and
Acute Sense - Sight Talents.
prayer.name: Wisdom of the Owl

prayer.description: Miracle of Morr and Mabyn. You gain Fear 1.
prayer.name: Death Mask

prayer.description: Miracle of Ranald and Evawn. Unlock one of the entries to a premises. For every +2 SL unlock another entry.
prayer.name: An Invitation

prayer.description: Miracle of Rhya. Sense the presence of all sentient creatures within Fel yards. Increase the radius by extra Fel yards for every +2 SL.
prayer.name: Rhya's Children

prayer.description: Miracle of Rhya. Target couple,  if biologically possible, will conceive a child.
prayer.name: Rhya's Union

prayer.description: Miracle of Shallya. Removes a poison or disease from the target. You may remove extra poison or disease for every +2 SL. Each removed disease or poison cause you 1d10 - Fel Bonus Wounds, not modified by Toughness or Armor.
prayer.name: Bitter Catharsis

prayer.description: Miracle of Sigmar. Any spells that target within Fel Bonus yards (plus extra Fel Bonus yards for every +2 SL) suffer -20 penalty to Language Magick Tests.
prayer.name: Heed Not the Witch

prayer.description: Miracle of Manann. You can walk on the water. Works only on larger bodies of water.
prayer.name: Waterwalk

prayer.description: Miracle of Morr. Ensures that the corpse cannot be targeted by any Necromantic spells. If the target has Undead and Construct Creature Traits, it is destroyed.
prayer.name: Last Rites

prayer.description: Miracle of Ranald. Sends a  Divine Servant in form of a cat. You can control the cat and sense through its senses.
prayer.name: Cat's Eyes

prayer.description: Miracle of Ranald and Ringil. Target gains + 10 Ag, +10 Stealth, and +1 Catfall Talent.
prayer.name: Ranald's Grace

prayer.description:
Miracle of Sigmar. Deal 1d10 Wounds to all targets within Fel Bonus yards. Targets with Undead and Daemon Traits gain Ablaze Condition. For every +2 SL, you can either increase the radius by +Fel Bonus or cause an extra +2 Damage to any Greenskins, Undead or servants
of the Ruinous Powers.
prayer.name: Soulfire

prayer.description: Miracle of Verena. If the target committed a crime they gain  Entangled Condition that cannot be removed for the duration. If they did not commit a crime they you are accusing them of, you gain +1 Sin Point and must roll on The Wrath of the Gods table.
prayer.name: Shackles of Truth

prayer.description: Reduces the duration of 1 disease by 1 day. May only be used once per disease per person.
prayer.name: Blessing of Recuperation

prayer.description: Target gets +10 Fel.
prayer.name: Blessing of Charisma

prayer.description: Miracle of Ulric. Target gains the Frenzy psychology.
prayer.name: Ulric's Fury

prayer.description: Remove 1 condition from the target.
prayer.name: Blessing of Tenacity

prayer.description: Miracle of Manann. Target boat gets extra wind in its sails.
prayer.name: Fair Winds
prayer.target: 1 sailing vessel within Line of Sight

prayer.description: Miracle of Sigmar. Comet strikes a point within Line of Sight. It causes 1d10 + SL Damage in the Fel Bonus radius. The damage ignores Toughness Bonus and Armor, and target gain Ablaze Condition.
prayer.name: Twin-tailed Comet

prayer.description: Miracle of Ranald and Mabyn. Affected targets can pass unnoticed.
prayer.name: You Ain't Seen Me, Right?

prayer.description: Miracle of Taal. All targets within Fel Bonus of the target point gain Entangled Condition. For every +2 SL you can either increase radius by another Fel Bonus yards or add 1 extra Entangled Condition. For the purposes of breaking free, Tanglefoot has a Strength equal to your Willpower.
prayer.name: Tanglefoot

prayer.description: Miracle of Verena. Target will answer your one question truthfully and fully. The target may try to resist the spell by taking an  Average (+20) Cool Test.
prayer.name: Truth Will Out

prayer.description: Target gets + 10 Dex.
prayer.name: Blessing of Finesse

prayer.description: Miracle of Manann. Target's lungs fill up with saltwater while this Miracle is lasts.
prayer.name: Drowned Manâ€™s Face

prayer.description: Miracle of Morr. Creates a line (up to 8 yards). Creatures with Undead Trait must pass a Challenging (+0) WP Test to cross the line. Creatures with Undead and Construct Traits cannot cross the line. Lasts until dawn.
prayer.name: Portal's Threshold

prayer.description: Miracle of Myrmidia. Creates a spectral Eagle. You can control it and see through its eyes.
prayer.name: Eagleâ€™s Eye

prayer.description: Miracle of Ulric. You case Fear 1 and all enemies within Fel yards lose -1 Advantage at the start of each round.
prayer.name: Hoarfrost's Chill

prayer.description: Miracle of Verena. While the Miracle lasts, your listeners will believe you are speaking the truth. To work, you cannot be lying.
prayer.name: As Verena Is My Witness

prayer.description: Target takes an Average (+20) Willpower Test. If failed, they are overcome with Shame and do not take the action.
prayer.name: Blessing of Conscience

prayer.description: Target can reroll their next failed test.
prayer.name: Blessing of Fortune

prayer.description: Miracle of Myrmidia. All affected targets get Hatred Psychology towards anyone they are fighting.
prayer.name: Fury's Call

prayer.description: Miracle of Myrmidia. Your spear gains Impact Quality and counts as Magical.
prayer.name: Spear of Myrmidia

prayer.description: Miracle of Shallya. Removes all Psychology Traits and puts the target into sleep until the next sunrise.
prayer.name: Balm to a Wounded Mind

prayer.description: Miracle of Shallya. Damage done to the target is transferred to you. Your Toughness Bonus is doubled when calculating Wounds suffered from this Damage.
prayer.name: Martyr

prayer.description: Miracle of Shallya. After praying for 10 - Fel Bonus rounds, remove 1 Critical Wound from the target. Remove extra Critical Wound for every +2 SL.
prayer.name: Shallya's Tears

prayer.description: Miracle of Sigmar. Your warhammer counts as Magical and deals + Fel Bonus Damage. Anyone struck with it receives  the Ablaze and Prone Conditions.
prayer.name: Sigmar's Fiery Hammer

prayer.description: Miracle of Ulric. If the target is weak, cowardly, or deceitful they suffer 1d10 Wounds that ignore Toughness Bonus and Armor Points, otherwise you suffer those effects.
prayer.name: The Snow King's Judgement

prayer.description: Miracle of Verena and Ringil. You can take a Challenging (+0) Perception Test to see through illusion or misdirection spells. You can take an Average (+20) Intuition Test to tell if someone is lying.
prayer.name: Blind Justice

prayer.description: Target gets +10 I.
prayer.name: Blessing of Wit

prayer.description: Miracle of Rhya. Grow enough food to feed 1 person for each round Miracle is in effect.
prayer.name: Rhya's Harvest

prayer.description: Miracle of Rhya and Evawn. Discover a naturally occurring shelter near by. The shelter is big enough for 1 person plus 1 extra person for every +2 SL.
prayer.name: Rhya's Shelter

prayer.description: Miracle of Taal. Target gains +1 Acute Sense (you get to chose which one). If the targets rests, they will automatically wake up if there is a threat within Initiative yards.
prayer.name: Animal Instincts

prayer.description: Target gets +10 WP.
prayer.name: Blessing of Courage

prayer.description: Target gets +10 BS.
prayer.name: Blessing of The Hunt

prayer.description: Target gets +10 S.
prayer.name: Blessing of Might

prayer.description: Enemies attacking target of this blessing, have to take an Average (+20) WP Test. If they fail they have to chose a different target or different Action.
prayer.name: Blessing of Protection

prayer.description: Miracle of Myrmidia. All non-Myrmidians looking at you  receive 1 Blinded Condition. They receive extra +1 Blinded Condition for every +2 SL.
prayer.name: Blazing Sun

prayer.description: Miracle of Myrmidia. All affected targets get +1 Drilled Talent.
prayer.name: Inspiring

prayer.description: Miracle of Rhya. Heal Fellowship Bonus wounds or cure 1 natural disease. You can chose another effect (including the same effect) for every +2 SL.
prayer.name: Rhyaâ€™s Touch

prayer.description: Miracle of Sigmar. All targets gain Hatred Psychology towards Greenskins, Undead, and any associated with Chaos.
prayer.name: Vanquish the Unrighteous

prayer.description: Miracle of Ranald and Evawn. Change the appearance of targets purse or attire.
prayer.name: Rich Man, Poor Man, Beggar Man, Thief

prayer.description: Miracle of Sigmar. All allies with Line of Sight to you remove all Broken Conditions and gain Fearless Talent while they remain in sight. All Greenskins with Line of Sight receive Fear 1.
prayer.name: Beacon of Righteous Virtue

prayer.description: Miracle of Taal. While active, you cannot lose the track of target you are pursuing. Works outside of settlements and only on known animals/individuals. You also gain +10 to all Tests regarding your prey.
prayer.name: Lord of the Hunt

prayer.description: Miracle of Ulric. Summons a Divine Servant in the form of a White Wolf that fight your enemies. It has stats of a Wolf and Frenzy, Magical, and Size - Large Creature Traits.
prayer.name: Howl of the Wolf

prayer.description: Miracle of Manann. After touching a body of water, it provide enough fish to feed 1 person. If the body of water is a sea, provides enough for 2 people.
prayer.name: Manann's Bounty

prayer.description: Miracle of Morr. Deal damage to all targets with Undead Trait around you.
prayer.name: Destroy Undead

prayer.description: Miracle of Shallya. Removes 1 Corruption point and 1 extra Corruption  point for every +2 SL. If the Miracle Fumble, both you and the target gain 1d10 Corruption points. Must be case within 1 hour of gaining Corruption.
prayer.name: Unblemished Innocence

prayer.description: Miracle of Ulric. Target suffers no penalties due to cold weather.
prayer.name: Pelt of the Winter Wolf

prayer.description: Miracle of Ulric. Your axe becomes Magical and causes +SL Damage. Any living target that gets struck, must make a Challenging (+0) Endurance Test or gain a Stunned Condition. Your axe cannot cause Bleeding Condition, and removes any existing Bleeding Condition from struck targets.
prayer.name: Winter's Bite

prayer.description: Miracle of Myrmidia. You can issue a command to any ally within line of sight. If the command results in a Leadership Test, gain +10 bonus to that Test.
prayer.name: Command the Legion

prayer.description: Miracle of Myrmidia. Gain Terror 1 Creature Trait.
prayer.name: Dismay Foe

prayer.description: Miracle of Myrmidia. Affected allies can disengage from the fight without enemies gaining advantage or making free attacks.
prayer.name: In Good Order

prayer.description: Miracle of Myrmidia. You can see enemy's profile, traits, skills, and talents.
prayer.name: Know Your Enemy

prayer.description: Miracle of Myrmidia. Affected allies cannot receive Broken Condition.
prayer.name: On Deadly Ground

prayer.description: Miracle of Myrmidia. At the start of every round you may take a Challenging (+0) Initiative Test. If successful you gain an immediate free attack outside the normal turn sequence.
prayer.name: Quick Strike

prayer.description:
Miracle of Myrmidia. All Myrmidians within range gain the Fearless (Enemy) Talent. This enemy may either be a particular individual,
or a particular species.
prayer.name: Shieldmaiden's Devotion

prayer.description: Miracle of Myrmidia. All allies in range get + 10 WS and +10 BS.
prayer.name: Skill of Combat

prayer.description: Miracle of Myrmidia. You must charge and attack nearest enemy. You can re-roll and Melee Test you make under while under effect of this Prayer.
prayer.name: Vengeful Wrath

prayer.description: Miracle of Handrich. You may add +2 SL to a successful Haggle Test. This raises by 1 for each +2 SL on the Pray Test.
prayer.name: A Deal's a Deal

prayer.description: Miracle of Handrich. After a successful Animal Training Test, the createure will carry anything you wish. It will not attack or follow your others oder than to carry your goods.
prayer.name: Carry My Burdens

prayer.description: Miracle of Handrich. The target cannot break the deal for at least Fel Bonus rounds. If they want act against the deal, they must pass  Average (+20) Cool Test contesting your SL. For each additional 2 SL they achive, the may take 1 additional action in opposition to the deal. If you break the deal, you suffer +1 Sin point.
prayer.name: Shake On It

prayer.description: Miracle of Handrich. After identyfying a trader of some goods through a Difficult (-10) Gossip Test, you may increase or decrease available stock of that goods. You can change item's Availability by 1 to affect its bartering Ratio.
prayer.name: Supply and Demand
prayer.target: One batch of trade goods in line of sight

prayer.description: Miracle of Handrich. You introduce people to the generosity of Handrich by offering them a gold coin and the assurance of future prosperity, thereby establishing friendly relations with them. A successful Charm Test while speaking to people of lower Status gains +1 SL for every SL of the Pray Test.
prayer.name: Trickle Down

prayer.description: Miracle of Handrich. You may spend target's 1 Fortune point as if it was yours. They may contest it by making  a Challenging (+0) Fellowship Test against your SL. If they achieve +4 SL or more, they can spend your 1 point instead.
prayer.name: Twist of Fortune

prayer.description: Miracle of Solkan. A wave of cleansing fire deals 1d0 Wounds (ignores TB and AP) to anyone with: Undead, Daemon, or Spellcaster Traits, any Sin or Corruption Points, Arcane Magic, Chaos Magic, or Petty Magic Talent.
prayer.name: Absolute Purity

prayer.description: Miracle of Solkan. The target is hit with a concussive blast that deals 1d10 + WP Bonus Damage, ignoring AP.
prayer.name: Fist of Vengeance

prayer.description: Miracle of Solkan. Solkan covers your sword with white flames. It becomes a Magic weapon with +6 Damage. Anyone successfuly struck with it gains +1 Ablaze Condition.
prayer.name: Flaming Blade

prayer.description: Miracle of Solkan. Blinding light pours from the sun. All targets in the AoE receive Fel Bonus number of Blinded Conditions. In addition, the light causes magic missile hit with Damage +2 to all affected targets.
prayer.name: Fury of the Righteous Sun

prayer.description: Miracle of Solkan. The area around you is lighten up with pale light. Tee affected targets cannot move or act in any way.
prayer.name: Light of Stasis

prayer.description: Miracle of Solkan. Suppress Winds of Magic in AoE. All spells are dispelled, magic items lose their qualities and Channeling and Casting Tests automatically fail.
prayer.name: Still the Winds

prayer.description: Miracle of Rhya. You touch a container with food (for example a barrel or crate). All food and ingredients double. Spoiled food becomes fresh again.
prayer.name: Rhya's Abundance

prayer.description: Miracle of Rhya. Anyone (humanoid) who did not make a sacrifice to Rhya since the last equinox loses 1 Wound (+1 for every SL) and gains a Fatigued Condition. If 5 of more persons are affected, the ground in the AoE becomes infertile for 1d10 years.
prayer.name: Rhya's Demand

prayer.description: Miracle of Rhya. You summon a nature spirit that will complete 1 task in the name of Rhya.
prayer.duration: Until sunrise or sunset, whichever comes sooner
prayer.name: Rhya's Dominion

prayer.description: Miracle of Rhya. You command a flock, herd, or a pack of domesticated animals. You can make them do anything within creatures' natural behavioural range.
prayer.name: Rhya's Flock

prayer.description: Miracle of Rhya. After you pass an Average (+20) Charm Animal Test, you domesticate any uncorrupted, animal of Size Large or smaller.
prayer.name: Rhya's Taming

prayer.description: Miracle of Rhya. You can only cast it to defend children, home or similar. You gain +2 SL to all Melee, Strength, and Toughness Tests. You also gain Immune to Psychology and Painless Traits.
prayer.name: Rhya's Rage

prayer.description: Miracle of Manann. Improve Manann mood by 2d10 - 1 for each Sinn point you have.
prayer.name: Blessed Voyage

prayer.description:
Miracle of Manann. Summon an albatross that follows the ship. As long as it is alive, the ship cannot sink. If the albatross is killed, the
ship suffers from -d10 Morale and -2d10 for Manann's Mood.
prayer.name: Blessing of the Albatross

prayer.description: Miracle of Manann. Character receiving this bonus gains +1 SL to any Row, Sail, or Swim Tests.
prayer.name: Blessing of the Mariner

prayer.description: Miracle of Manann. Character receiving this blessing can breath under water.
prayer.name: Breathe Water

prayer.description: Miracle of Manann. Reduce the M rating of a strait or whirlpool to 0.
prayer.name: Quell Waters

prayer.description:
Miracle of Manann. Call a cure upon a crew that does not warrant
the respect of Manann (Chaos, followers of Stromfels, Orcs and Goblins, Skaven, crews who have a negative Manannâ€™s Mood score). All Damage to them is increased by 2.
prayer.name: Sea Curse

prayer.description: Miracle of Manann. You calm down a water creature. It will not be hostile unless it suffers damage or adverse Conditions.
prayer.name: Repel Sea Beast
prayer.target: 1 creature with the Aquatic or Marine Creature Trait

prayer.description: Miracle of Manann. Target ship suffers -1 M and -1 SL to Man.
prayer.name: Rip Tides

prayer.description: Miracle of Stromfels. You can more easily follow some who is bleeding. To successfully follow them you must pass an Easy (+40) Track Test.
prayer.name: Blood Trail

prayer.description: Miracle of Stromfels. Inflict nightmares upon the target. Whenever they take a rest test to recover from Fatigued Condition, they must pass a Difficult (-10) Cool Test. If they fail, the Condition remains.
prayer.name: Curse of the Harsh Mistress

prayer.description: Miracle of Stromfels. Roll 1d10 to change Manann's Mood, add +1 for each Sin Point. 1-4: Manann's mood is 0; 5-8: roll 5d10 and add it to Mannan's Mood if currently negative or subtract if positive; 9: no effect; 10+: roll 5d10 and subtract it from Mannan's Mood.
prayer.name: Manann's Mood Made Meaningless

prayer.description: Miracle of Stromfels. Create a massive wave that can crash into boat, shore, etc. The wave has CR of 15.
prayer.name: Raging Seas

prayer.description: Miracle of Stromfels. Target suffers from seasickness.
prayer.name: Seasickness

prayer.description: Miracle of Stromfels. Double the target ship's Holed Rating.
prayer.name: Send'em to Stromfels

prayer.description: Miracle of Stromfels. Increase intensity of the wind by 1.
prayer.name: Storm Winds

prayer.description: Miracle of Ulric. Add +20 to severity roll for any Critical Wounds you inflict.
prayer.name: Wolf's Bite

prayer.description: Miracle of Ulric. Gain Berserk Charge Talent. If you already have it, gain an extra rank ignoring the usual max rank rules.
prayer.name: Howl of Battle

prayer.description: Miracle of Ulric. Once per Round, you may re-roll one missed attack.
prayer.name: Crush the Weak

prayer.description: Miracle of Ulric. The target loses 1d10 Wounds. It also has to pass a Challenging (+0) Endurance Test or become unable to perform any action next turn. The only allowed actions are defensive ones to avoid an attack.
prayer.name: Frostbite

prayer.description: Miracle of Ulric. Affected allies lose all Broken Conditions. They become immune to Fear, Terror, and effects of Intimidate (Skill), Frightening (Talent) and similar.
prayer.name: Heart of the Wolf

prayer.description: Miracle of Ulric. Gain cold immunity.
prayer.name: Hoarfrost Thews

prayer.description: Miracle of Ulric. Affected targets take Damage +5 hit and must pass  a Challenging (+0) Willpower Test or gain 1 Stunned Condition.
prayer.name: Ice Storm

prayer.description: Miracle of Sigmar. Affected allies get +20 to Fear and Terror. Undead and Daemonic creatures cannot get inside the AoE or attack anyone in there.
prayer.name: Zone of Sanctuary

prayer.description: Miracle of Mathlann. Targets can breathe under water. Without water they are subject to Suffocation and Drowning. You may add 1 extra target per +2 SL.
prayer.name: Waterlungs

prayer.description: Miracle of Mathlann. Turn the whole ship invisible. Ships with more than 1 mast, require +2 SL  per extra mast. The ship leaves a trace on the water that can be noticed with a Challenging (+0) Perception Test.
prayer.name: Cloak of Mathlann

prayer.description: Miracle of the Spider-God. Covers everything with a mystic poison causing Poisoned Condition and 1d10+SL damage which ignores Armour Points.
prayer.name: Kiss of da Black Pit

prayer.description: Miracle of the Spider-God. All targets in range suffer 1 Wound which ignores Toughness Bonus and AP. Causes 1 additional Wound for each +2 SL. In addition, affected targets suffer -10 penalty to all Tests.
prayer.name: Plague of Scuttlin'

prayer.description: Miracle of the Spider-God. All targets within Fel Bonus of the target point gain Entangled Condition. For every +2 SL you can either increase radius by another Fel Bonus yards or add 1 extra Entangled Condition. For the purposes of breaking free, it has a Strength equal to your Willpower.
prayer.name: Snare 'Em Good

prayer.description: Miracle of the Night Prowler (Ranald aspect). You must have a specific target in mind and it has to be within spell's range. You hear target's conversation and you you can whisper words to them.
prayer.name: Distant Sounds

prayer.description: Miracle of the Night Prowler (Ranald aspect). You can reach everything within Fellowship Bonus Yards with your hands, including items with Enc 2 or less.
prayer.name: Long Reach

prayer.description: Miracle of the Night Prowler (Ranald aspect). Touch and illegally obtained item. Receive location of nearest Fence in settlements. Fence's disposition depends on GM, but will trade if you have 0 Sin Points.
prayer.name: Lose the Loot

prayer.description: Miracle of the Night Prowler (Ranald aspect). Creates zone of silence where only ambient noise is heard, masking sudden sounds like footsteps or barking.
prayer.name: Silence Reigns

prayer.description: Miracle of the Night Prowler (Ranald aspect). Hides valuables as worthless items during searches. There is 1% chance per hour that Ranald permanently keeps each hidden valuable.
prayer.name: Poor Man's Face

prayer.description: Miracle of the Night Prowler (Ranald aspect). Gain +8 SL to one Charm Test when caught red-handed.
prayer.name: Talk Your Way Out

prayer.description: Miracle of the Night Prowler (Ranald aspect). For next few hours after committing crime: People ignore you.  All Fellowship Tests -3 SL. Effect ends if you commit another crime.
prayer.name: The Heat Is Of

prayer.description: Miracle of the Gamester (Ranald aspect). Affected targets can reverse percentile dice roll on next Test. Has to be used within Fellowship Bonus Rounds.
prayer.name: Bountiful Fortune

prayer.description: Miracle of the Gamester (Ranald aspect). The target in range must abandon planned Fellowship Test. If forced to take test anyway, they suffer -20 penalty.
prayer.name: Crisis of Confidence

prayer.description:
Miracle of the Gamester (Ranald aspect). Gain bonus SL to your next Test:
Start with +1 SL. Roll d10. For 6 and less gain extra +1SL and ability to roll again. If you roll 7 or more lose all accrued bonus SL, and suffer -1SL to the Test instead.
prayer.name: Force the Hand of Chance

prayer.description: Miracle of the Gamester (Ranald aspect). Fully understand target's meaning, intentions and thoughts during conversation, regardless of language.
prayer.name: Perfect Empathy

prayer.description: Miracle of the Gamester (Ranald aspect). When observing games you learn all rules and optimal strategies instantly and gain +4 SL on Tests for mental skill-based games. Only rules knowledge remains after effect ends.
prayer.name: The Gamemaster

prayer.description: Miracle of the Gamester (Ranald aspect). All Test results become either Astounding Success or Impressive Failure.
prayer.name: Up the Stakes

prayer.description: Miracle of the Deceiver (Ranald aspect). May reroll results on Purse Contents and Victim Quirk tables, must keep second roll.
prayer.name: A Suitable Sucker

prayer.description: Miracle of the Deceiver (Ranald aspect). Target must pass Hard (-20) Cool Test or follow your non-self-harming command next round. Doesn't affect Undead/Daemonic.
prayer.name: Bamboozle

prayer.description: Miracle of the Deceiver (Ranald aspect). Add bonus SL to Charm Test for telling lie equal to d10 roll + Prayer Test SL. GM may grant extra SL for entertaining (not plausible) lies.
prayer.name: One Almighty Lie

prayer.description: Miracle of the Deceiver (Ranald aspect). For one Opposed Test you change two Characteristics to be the same as an opponent. Roll d10 twice (re-roll on duplicate): 1-2: WS, 3-4: Int, 5-6: Fel, 7-8: Initiative, 9-0: Your choice
prayer.name: Ranald's Mischief

prayer.description: Miracle of the Deceiver (Ranald aspect). Any creature you pass must pass Hard (-20) Cool Test to remember more than 2 of yours appearance details. You chose what they remember.
prayer.name: Unremembered Face

prayer.description: Miracle of the Protector (Ranald aspect). Any Wounds inflicted by the strongest participant during a single attack may be added to the Wounds inflicted the next time the weaker participant causes Damage to the strongest participant. Stronger opponent is determined by having higher values in at least 2 of: S, T, WS. Cannot be used in combat you're engaged in.
prayer.name: Back At You

prayer.description: Miracle of the Protector (Ranald aspect). Curse a target with Gold Status with Curse of Ill-Fortune (WFRP p. 255). It lasts number of days equal to target's Gold Standing + Prayer Test SL. No effect on Ranald followers.
prayer.name: Class War

prayer.description: Miracle of the Protector (Ranald aspect). Target automatically resists Charm and Leadership Tests from higher status characters.
prayer.name: Free Your Mind

prayer.description: Miracle of the Protector (Ranald aspect). Gain Immunity to Psychology Trait for the duration.
prayer.name: Moment of Clarity

prayer.description: Miracle of the Protector (Ranald aspect). Allies gain +2 SL to Endurance and Cool Tests, +1 additional SL per 10 people in crowd. Does not affect Silver/Gold Status characters.
prayer.name: Rally Round

prayer.description: Miracle of the Protector (Ranald aspect). Target must pass Challenging (+0) Cool Test each morning after sleep or gain Fatigued Condition. Can only affects those who have persecuted others. Effect ends when target makes amends.
prayer.name: Under my Protection

prayer.description: Miracle of Taal. Target gains + Fellowship Bonus SL to Toughness Tests for the duration.
prayer.name: Aurochâ€™s Heart

prayer.description: Miracle of Taal. All targets within Fellowship yards must pass Difficult (-10) Athletics Test or become Prone. Built structures take d10+SL damage.
prayer.name: Earthshudder

prayer.description: Miracle of Taal. Food from wild becomes more nourishing. Can affect up to 6 meals. Each meal sustains one person for 4 days without starvation Endurance Tests.
prayer.name: Nature's Repast

prayer.description: Miracle of Taal. Natural animals (Int â‰¤ 25) become passive, won't attack. Does not affect bipedal and Chaos creatures. Effect breaks if animal is attacked.
prayer.name: Pax of Taal

prayer.description: Miracle of Taal. Target gains +20 Strength until the end of the miracle.
prayer.name: Rending Paw

prayer.description: Miracle of Taal. Gain +4 SL to Swim Tests and move at full Movement rate in fresh water.
prayer.name: River's Blessing

prayer.description: Miracle of Taal. All targets in the AoE suffer -2 SL to WS/Agi Tests. Targets must pass Difficult (-10) Toughness Test each round or become Prone. No ranged attacks can be used except gunpowder/artillery. The caster is unaffected.
prayer.name: Wild Wind

prayer.description: Miracle of Taal. Perform this miracle before travelling.  The prayer Test SL can be used to reroll for Planning, Travel, or Camp Endeavours during journey. Unused rerolls are lost if journey interrupted by an encounter.
prayer.name: Wilderness Way

spell.description: You can become any Beast of the Beasts of the Reikland section of the Bestiary.
spell.name: Beast Form

spell.description: Deal magic missile Damage +10 and inflict 1 Blinded Condition.
spell.name: T'Essla's Arc

spell.description: Turn any metal into gold.
spell.name: Fool's Gold

spell.description: Affects all creature whose Toughness is lower than your Willpower. All creatures with Undead or Daemonic Traits gain Unstable Trait. If they already had Unstable Trait, their Wounds are reduced to 0.
spell.name: Banishment

spell.description: Emit blinding bright light. Everyone who is looking at you and does not have Arcane Magic (Light) Talent, receives +SL Blinded Conditions.
spell.name: Blinding Light

spell.description: Preserve day's worth of food rations. While preserved the rations cannot go bad.
spell.name: Conserve

spell.description: You can clearly hear what the target is saying.
spell.name: Eavesdrop

spell.description: Add +WP Bonus SL to any dispelling you do.
spell.name: Magic Shield

spell.description: Gain Ward (9+) Creature Trait.
spell.name: Ward

spell.description: You have to be in direct contact with earth. All creatures with direct contact with earth in the affected area heal your WP Bonus Wounds at the start of every Round.
spell.name: Earthblood

spell.description: Drain target's life. Deal damage that counts as magic missile with +0 Damage and then Heal 1 Wound.
spell.name: Drain

spell.description: Cause a small object to move. If the object is currently being held, the holder must pass an Average (+20) Dexterity Test or they will drop it.
spell.name: Twitch

spell.description: Create a blast that counts as magic missile (Damage +3) that applies to everyone in the affected area.
spell.name: Blast

spell.description: You gain the Dark Vision Creature Trait.
spell.name: Dark Vision

spell.description: You  gain the Distracting Creature Trait.
spell.name: Distracting

spell.description: Heal 1d10 Wounds and remove all Bleeding Conditions. If the target does not have Arcane Magic - Fire Talent, they must pass a Challenging(+0) Cool Test or scream in agony. If they fail by 6 SL, they gain Unconscious Condition and are permanently scarred.
spell.name: Cauterise

spell.description: Gain Fear (1) Trait, +1 War Leader Talent and +10 on all attempts to Channel and Cast  Aqshy. For each +2 SL you can increase Fear by +1 or take extra level of War Leader Talent.
spell.name: Crown of Flame

spell.description: After communicating with the earth for 1 minute you know a detailed layout of the land and all natural features within range. Each time you increase the range with Overcasting, increase communication time by 1 minute.
spell.name: Lie of the Land

spell.description: While the spell lasts, the target loses all memories that involve you. Once the spell is over, the target has to pass an Average (+20) Intelligence Test or the memory loss becomes permanent (can be dispelled though).
spell.name: Mindslip

spell.description: Stab a puppet to cause harm to a target. Type of harm depends on the stabbed body part.
spell.name: Curse of Crippling Pain

spell.description: Summon a Lesser Daemon. If you win Opposed Channel - Dhar/Willpower you respond to your one command and vanish. If you lose the Test, it will attack you.
spell.name: Manifest Lesser Daemon

spell.description: Reanimate WP Bonus + SL dead bodies as Zombies or Skeletons. For each +2 SL, you may raise extra WP Bonus + SL creatures.
spell.name: Reanimate

spell.description: -30 penalty to Track Tests for anyone trying to track you in rural area.
spell.name: Careful Step

spell.description: Create a gust of wind strong enough to blow a candle or slam an open door.
spell.name: Gust

spell.description: Create a small light (brightness of a torch) in your hand. If you pass an Average (+20) Channelling Test, the light can be adjusted to be of candle or lantern intensity.
spell.name: Light

spell.description: Your voice originates from a point within Willpower yards rather than from you.
spell.name: Murmured Whisper

spell.description: Detect if the object is poisoned or trapped.
spell.name: Warning

spell.description: Make a Breath attack (as if you spent 2 Advantage to activate the Breath Creature Trait). Breath attack count as magic missile (Damage +T Bonus).
spell.name: Breath

spell.description: Gain Terror (1) Creature Trait.
spell.name: Terrifying

spell.description: Summons a flock of local birds. The birds attack everyone who does not have Arcane Magic - Beasts Talent by inflicting +7 Damage at the end of every round. Everyone within affected area gains +1 Blinded Condition. After passing an Average (+20) Charm Animal you can move the flock within the range.
spell.name: Flock of Doom

spell.description: Target gains the Regenerate Creature Trait.
spell.name: Regenerate

spell.description: While the spell is active target ignores all negative mental modifies - from any source.
spell.name: Clarity of Thought

spell.description: Target gain 1 Blinded Condition, and 1 Blinded Condition at the start of each Round for as long as the spell lasts.
spell.name: Dazzle

spell.description: Create a number (up to your Int Bonus) of small flickering lights. After passing an Average (+20) Channelling Test you can send the lights moving in any direction.
spell.name: Marsh Lights

spell.description: Bolt is a magic missile (Damage +4).
spell.name: Bolt

spell.description: Magic missile (Damage +4). If it reduces Wounds to 0, it jumps to another target within spell's initial range and within Willpower Bonus yards of the previous target.
spell.name: Chain Attack

spell.description: Everyone inside the dome gains Ward (6+) Creature Trait.
spell.name: Dome

spell.description: Gain Flight (Agility) Creature Trait.
spell.name: Flight

spell.description: Gain +20 T, Dark Vision and Fear (1) Creature Traits, and Acute Sense - Smell Talent.
spell.name: Hunter's Hide

spell.description: Affected targets gain +1 Drilled, Fearless, and Stout-hearted Talents. They also lose all Broken and Fatigued Conditions.
spell.name: Flaming Hearts

spell.description: Pool Fortune Points with everyone that has Arcane Magic (Heavens) Talent. After the spell ends, remaining Fortune Points are redistributed as fairly as possible.
spell.name: Fate's Fickle Fingers

spell.description: Enchanted weapon counts as Magical, gains +WP Bonus to damage, and Unbreakable Quality. For every +3 SL you can add 1 Quality of remove 1 Flaw from the weapon.
spell.name: Enchant Weapon

spell.description: After passing an Average (+20) Strength Test you can bend non-magical object made of metal.
spell.name: Mutable Metal

spell.description: Creates protective barrier against creatures with Daemonic or Undead Traits, mutations, and those with more Corruption points that WP Bonus + T Bonus. They cannot enter and if they are already in, they gain Broken Condition until they leave. No one in the protected area cannot gain any Corruption Points.
spell.name: Pha's Protection

spell.description: If the target needs to breath, they get +1 Fatigued Condition, cannot talk, and suffer from Suffocation.
spell.name: Choking Shadows

spell.description: One of the ingredients must be an object belonging to the target. Target receives -10 to all Tests and cannot spend Fortune Points.
spell.name: Curse of Ill-Fortune

spell.description: Create a screaming skull that moves in a straight line. Anyone in its path without Undead Trait takes magic missile Damage +WP Bonus. Anyone who lost Wounds due to this spell must pass a Challenging (+0) Cool Test or gain Broken Condition.
spell.name: Screaming Skull

spell.description: Create a small flame in your hand. The flame emits light and heat.
spell.name: Magic Flame

spell.description: Put the target to sleep.
spell.name: Sleep

spell.description: Gain Fear 1. For every +2 SL increase Fear by 1.
spell.name: Fearsome

spell.description: Gain +SL Armour Points to all locations  when calculating damage from melee attacks. If attacked by metal weapon, the attacker takes +WP Bonus Damage.
spell.name: Cerulean Shield

spell.description: The target does not have to eat or drink for the duration of the spell.
spell.name: Fat of the Land

spell.description: Bring life a desolated or blighted area. For example a barren field or dry riverbed.
spell.name: Lifebloom

spell.description: Heals target's Wounds euqal to your Int + WP Bonuses. Targets may attempt a Very Hard (-30) Endurance Test to lose 1 Corruption point gained in the last hour.
spell.name: Healing Light

spell.description: Everyone in the affected area that do not have Arcane Magic (Shadows) Talent gains +1 Blinded, Deafened, and Fatigued Conditions which stay for the whole duration of the spell. Affected targets that try to move have to pass a Challenging (+0) Perception Test or receive Prone Condition.
spell.name: Mystifying Miasma

spell.description: You enchant a small charm with spell of protection. The wearer gains Magic Resistance Talent. If the wearer already has this talent, the charm has no effect.
spell.name: Protective Charm

spell.description: Int Bonus Undead targets gain a free Move or Action (has to be the same for all targets). For every +2 SL, you can affect additional Int Bonus targets.
spell.name: Vanhel's Call

spell.description: Target receives 1 Stunned Condition.
spell.name: Shock

spell.description: You can talk to creatures with Bestial Trait and get +20 to all Charm Animal and Animal Training Tests. While active you cannot speak non-bestial tongues.
spell.name: Beast Tongue

spell.description: Hurl a great fireball at an enemy that deals magic missile +10 Damage that ignores AP and inflicts +2 Ablaze Conditions and Prone Condition. Everyone in the affected area around the target, receives magic missile +5 Damage (ignores AP) and must pass a Challenging (+0) Dodge Test to avoid getting Ablaze Condition. Sets the ground on fire.
spell.name: Great Fires of U'Zhul

spell.description: Cover a sword in magical flames. The sword becomes +6 Damage and receives Impact Quality. Enemies hit by the affected sword gain +1 Ablaze Condition. If the wielder of the sword does not have Arcane Magic - Fire, they receive +1 Ablaze Condition whenever they fumble an attack. Talent
spell.name: Flaming Sword of Rhuin

spell.description: You move through the ground. After casting the spell, you disappear into the ground and reappear on the next Round at any point within Willpower yards. If you engage anyone after reappearing, they get a Surprised Condition.
spell.name: Earthpool

spell.description: Create blight (permanent) in a well, field, or a domestic animal.
spell.name: Blight

spell.description: Target must have Daemonic Trait and WP lower than yours. Target loses WP Bonus Wounds that ignore Toughness Bonus and Armor. Increase one of your characteristics by +10 for the duration of the spell.
spell.name: Destroy Lesser Daemon

spell.description: Raise SL+1 Skeletons in the affected area. For each +2 SL, you may summon extra SL Skeletons.
spell.name: Raise Dead

spell.description: Open any non-magical lock.
spell.name: Open Lock

spell.description: Cause rot to fist-sized volume of organic material such as food, cloth, or leather. Leather armor loses 1 AP on 1 location.
spell.name: Rot

spell.description: Water bubbles from the ground at a rate of 1 pint per Round for Initiative Bonus Rounds.
spell.name: Spring

spell.description: Gain Arboreal, Armour (2), Belligerent, Big, Bite (Strength Bonus +1), Fear (1), Fury, Magical, Weapon (SB+2) Creature Traits. While the spell is active you cannot use any Language or Lore Skills.
spell.name: Wyssan's Wildform

spell.description: Gain +1 Fate. The point is lost if not spent before end of the spell.
spell.name: The Third Portent of Amul

spell.description: Target an item made of metal. You can add 1 Quality or remove 1 Flaw. For each +2 SL you can add/remove 1 extra Quality/Flaw.
spell.name: Forge of Chamon

spell.description: Create an illusion in the affected area. Only those with Second Sight Talent, if they pass a Difficult (-10) Perception Test, can notice that they are looking at an illusion.
spell.name: Illusion

spell.description: Everyone in the affected area gains +10 to all Fellowship Tests and Animosity and Hatred Psychologies are suppressed.
spell.name: Goodwill

spell.description: You know where the North is.
spell.name: Bearings

spell.description: Keep yourself dry in rain, snow, etc.
spell.name: Protection from Rain

spell.description: The target must pass a Challenging (+0) Dex Test or they immediately drop the object they are holding. For every +2 SL add -10 penalty to the Test.
spell.name: Drop

spell.description: Push back all living creatures within WP Bonus yards. The creatures are pushed back by WP bonus yards and gain Prone Condition. For every +2 SL, the creatures are pushed by an extra WP Bonus yards.
spell.name: Push

spell.description: Create a spear that deals magic missile hit Damage +12 and pierces through leather and fur Armour. If the target suffers any Wounds, they also receive 1 Bleeding Condition, and the spear passes through, striking next target in its path. The spear deals -1 Damage for each target it goes through. If it does not cause any Wound on the target, the spear stops. Inflicts a minimum of 1 Wound on the first target.
spell.name: The Amber Spear

spell.description: Gain +1 Fortune Point and +1 additional point for each +2 SL. All extra points are lost if not spent before end of the spell.
spell.name: The First Portent of Amul

spell.description: For every target in the affected area chose one: Do not count as Overburdened or Count as two steps more Overburdened.
spell.name: Feather of Lead

spell.description: Gain +20 to Intelligence and Initiative.
spell.name: Speed of Thought

spell.description: Target becomes invisible to anyone without Second Sight Talent. Those with Second Sight must pass Challenging (+0) Perception Test to notice someone is nearby.
spell.name: Shroud of Invisibility

spell.description: The target must be looking at you. If you win Opposed Intimidate/Cool Test (add SL from casting roll to your result) the target gains +1 Fatigued Condition per +2 SL by which you win. If you win by 6 or more SL, they gain Broken Condition.
spell.name: The Evil Eye

spell.description: Make a Breath attack as if you had spent 2 Advantage to activate the Breath Creature Trait.
spell.name: Stream of Corruption

spell.description: Reduce target's Initiative to 10. During its Turn all movement is random and they can perform Action only after passinf a Challenging (+0) Cool Test.
spell.name: Acquiescence

spell.description: Make friends with a creature (has Beast Trait) that is smaller than you.
spell.name: Animal Friend

spell.description: Remove all non-magical impurities (such as poison) form water in a container. Non-water liquids are turned into water.
spell.name: Purify Water

spell.description: Teleport 1 small object (up to the size of your fist) from your person to your hand.
spell.name: Sly Hands

spell.description: Your spirit separates from the body that remains immobile and suffer Prone Condition. The spirit is invisible, immune to non-megical damage and can go through physical obstacles. It also has all you characteristics, skills, etc. and can cast spells. You can interact with other invisible creatures, spirits, ethereal creatures, and Daemons.
spell.name: Mirkride

spell.description: The target is attacked by swarm of Giant Rats, Giant Spiders, or Snakes. The swarm uses stats of regular creature with an extra Swarm Trait.
spell.name: Creeping Menace

spell.description: Target cannot use Talents and cannot add Skill Advances when making Skill Tests.
spell.name: Treason of Tzeentch

spell.description: You gain Corrosive Blood Creature Trait.
spell.name: Corrosive Blood

spell.description: Call down a comet from the sky that deal magic missile Damage +12 to all affected targets at the end of the next round. Affected targets also gain Ablaze and Prone conditions.
spell.name: Comet of Casandora

spell.description: Teleport up to Willpower yards. Any Engaged enemies gain Surprised Condition.
spell.name: Shadowstep

spell.description: Create a powerful drink, that when drunk by someone, that someone can chose to completely forget one individual, permanently. The drink lasts WP Bonus rounds.
spell.name: Nepenthe

spell.description: Must be cast on already prepared draught. If the potion is drank while the spell is active, it heals WP Bonus Wounds and cures 1 disease +1 extra disease for every +2 SL.
spell.name: Nostrum

spell.description: Detects any Daemons in any form in the range.
spell.name: Detect Daemon

spell.description: You can move an un-animated object with your mind. with a Strengths equal to your Willpower.
spell.name: Move Object

spell.description: Your magical abilities cannot be detected. While active you cannot cast any other spells.
spell.name: Mundane Aura

spell.description: Convince a creature with Bestial Trait that you are its pack master. It will instinctively understand your intentions.
spell.name: Beast Master

spell.description: Create a circle that cannot be crossed by creatures with Undead Trait.
spell.name: Sanctify

spell.description: Create wall of fire that is WP Bonus yards wide, and 1 yard deep. Anyone trying to cross it receives magic missile Damage +WP Bonus and gains 1 Ablaze Condition. For each +2 SL you can extend the wall by WP Bonus yards.
spell.name: Firewall

spell.description: Gain +SL Fortune Point and +1 additional point for each +2 SL. All extra points are lost if not spent before end of the spell.
spell.name: The Second Portent of Amul

spell.description: Gain the Ward (9+) Trait against all attacks. Each hit saved, increases rating of the Ward by 1, up to a max of Ward (3+).
spell.name: Glittering Robe

spell.description: You can see invisible creatures even those impossible to see.
spell.name: Part the Branches

spell.description: Pull a small animal out of bag, pocket, etc. The animal must be appropriate to the location.
spell.name: Produce Small Animal

spell.description: Unarmed attacks count as Magical and deal Damage equal to your WP Bonus. If you attack cause Wounds, inflict +1 Bleeding condition.
spell.name: Amber Talons

spell.description: Gain +WP Bonus AP on all locations, and Fear (1) Trait. For every +2 SL you may increase your Fear rating by 1.
spell.name: Purple Pall of Shyish

spell.description: Create a scythe (Polearm). It deals WP Bonus +3 damage. Enemies with Undead Trait do not receive Advantage when Engaged in combat with you.
spell.name: Scythe of Shyish

spell.description: You can spend Fortune Points to force opponents to reroll Tests.
spell.name: Starcrossed

spell.description: Instantly melt a metallic object. If the object was being worn, the wearer take magic missile Damage +WP Bonus that ignores Toughness Bonus.
spell.name: Crucible of Chamon

spell.description: You change bodies of affected targets into metal. All targets take magic missile Damage +WP Bonus that ignores Toughness, +1 AP to all locations, receive +1 Blinded, Deafened,  Stunned Conditions that last whole duration of the spell, and suffer from Suffocation.
spell.name: Transmutation of Chamon

spell.description: Create small noises nearby. If you pass an Average (+20) Channelling Test you can move the source of sounds or increase/decrease volume.
spell.name: Sounds

spell.description: Protects you from any missiles with organic matter (such as arrows).
spell.name: Arrow Shield

spell.description: Target gains Entangled Condition with a Strength equal to your Int. For every +2 SL you may give the target an extra Entangled Condition. Lasts until all Entangled Conditions are removed.
spell.name: Entangle

spell.description: Teleport to a point up to WP Bonus yards. For every +2 SL you can increase the distance by WP Bonus yards.
spell.name: Teleport

spell.description: Deal magic missile Damage +6 that ignores Toughness Bonus and Armour. Heal 1 Wound for each 2 inflicted Wounds.
spell.name: Caress of Laniph

spell.description: Bring death to a target with 0 Wounds and at least 2 Critical Wounds. Target cannot be raised as Undead.
spell.name: Swift Passing

spell.description: Set all flammable things on fire. All creatures receive +SL Ablaze Conditions. Burns all objects under Corrupting Influence. You can maintain this spell in subsequent rounds by passing a Challenging (+0) Channelling Test.
spell.name: Purge

spell.description: Target gains +1 Stunned Condition that cannot be lost while the spell lasts. Creatures with Bestial Trait are immune.
spell.name: Net of Amyntok

spell.description: Create a shadow steed. While not in sunlight it gains Dark Vision, Ethereal, Magical, Painless, Stealthy, Stride, Fear (1) and Ward (+9) Traits.
spell.name: Shadowsteed

spell.description: The location become haunted. Anyone in it, unless they have Magic (Witchcraft) Talent, gain +1 Fatigued Condition. They also need to pass a Challenging (+0) Cool Test or gain another +1 Fatigued Condition and Broken Condition.
spell.name: Haunting Horror

spell.description: Gain + 1 AP to all Hit Locations.
spell.name: Aethyric Armour

spell.description: Targets receives magic missile Damage +6 that ignores Armour and  +1 Fatigued Condition. Remove all Fatigued Conditions you have currently and restore up to half (rounded up) of Wounds dealt.
spell.name: Steal Life

spell.description: Become immune to non-magical fire and ignore Ablaze Condition. You also get Ward (9+) Creature Trait against magical fire attacks.
spell.name: Aqshy's Aegis

spell.description: Cover earth with tangled brambles. Anyone trying to go through it has to attempt a Hard (-20) Agility Test. If failed, they gain 1 Bleeding and 1 Entangled (with Strength equal to your WP). Conditions
spell.name: Forest of Thorns

spell.description: Casting Test is Opposed by Daemon's (creature with Daemonic Trait) Willpower Test. If succeeded the Daemon is destroyed and everyone looking at the process receive +SL Blinded Conditions unless they posses Arcane Magic (Light) Talent.
spell.name: Daemonbane

spell.description: Create a magic missile with +0 Damage.
spell.name: Dart

spell.description: Create a melee weapon with Damage equal to your WP Bonus. This weapon counts as magical.
spell.name: Aethyric Arms

spell.description: You can talk to the soul of recently (up to 1 day) deceased.
spell.name: Dying Words

spell.description: All targets in the affected area receive +1 Broken Condition. Undead targets receive magic missile Damage +10 that ignores Toughness Bonus and Armour.
spell.name: Soul Vortex

spell.description: Target gains + 2 Toughness Bonus and -10 to Ag and Dex.
spell.name: Barkskin

spell.description: Assume form any familiar humanoid. Only those with Second Sight Talent, if they pass a Difficult (-10) Perception Test, can notice that you are disguising your form.
spell.name: Doppelganger

spell.description: Targets with Daemonic Trait with WP lower than twice yours WP cannot enter or leave the affected area.
spell.name: Octagram

spell.description: The Fenbeast gains the Frenzy Trait.
spell.name: Belligerence of the Bloodmarsh

spell.description: After successful Casting Test, make an Opposed Willpower/Toughness Test against the construct. If successful, the construct becomes lifeless.
spell.name: Collapse Construct

spell.description:
Successful cast reveals any curses on the item. If the item is indeed cursed, after successful reveal you must make a Challenging (+0) Intelligence Test. Failure means you suffer Moderate Exposure to
Corruption.
spell.name: Decipher Curse

spell.description: Can be cast at someone who is channelling a spell. If successful, you can take an Opposed Willpower Test. If you succeed, the spell fails and they suffer a Minor Miscast.
spell.name: Disrupt Magic

spell.description: Arcane spell. The Fenbeast gains the Distracting Creature Trait.
spell.name: Fly-Infested Rotweed

spell.description:
The affected Fenbeast regenerates double the number
of Wounds it normally does.
spell.name: Lifebloom Silt

spell.description: Creates a zone of silence around the caster. No sound can't be heard inside the zone. People outside the zone cannot hear anything emanating from it. Casting from inside the zone suffers a penalty of -3 SL.
spell.name: Silence

spell.description: The creature imminently recovers Wounds equal to its Toughness Bonus. If you achieve +3 SL or more, it recovers twice its Toughness Bonus.
spell.name: Succour Magical Servant
spell.target: One of your Familiars or Constructs

spell.description: Learning XP: 400. CN is equal to the beastâ€™s Wounds. You project your will onto that of the target beast. You must win an Opposed Willpower Test against the creature to control it.
spell.name: Bind Monstrous Beast

spell.description: Learning XP: 600. If the ritual takes place at a Leyline Junction or Arcane Fulcrum, the CN is 16. Binds a minor spirit within a Power Stone.
spell.name: Bind Spirit Within Power Stone

spell.description: Learning XP: 450. Create an Ogham Stone. It it can have one of the following waystone properties: Attraction, Containment, or Dampening
spell.name: Carve Ogham Stone

spell.description: Learning XP: 400. Create a Power Stone of a type corresponding to the Lore of Magic you work with.
spell.name: Create Power Stone

spell.description: Learning XP: 500. The bloody totem takes on the form of an Incarnate Elemental of Beasts.
spell.name: Conjuration of the Bloody Hidesman

spell.description: Learning XP: 500. The twin-headed serpentine form of an Incarnate Elemental of Death hatches from the hourglass.
spell.name: Conjuration of the Incarnate Elemental of Death

spell.description: Learning XP: 500. Incarnate Elemental of Fire emerges from the pyre.
spell.name: Conjuration of the Jack O' Cinders

spell.description: Learning XP: 450. Corrupts the waystone.
spell.name: Corrupt Waystone

spell.description: Learning XP: 400. Creates a Construct to serve its master. For the cost of extra CN, it can have additional traits.
spell.name: Create Construct

spell.description: Learning XP: 250. Creates a Familiar. It can have extra traits for the cost of additional CN.
spell.name: Create Familiar

spell.description: Learning XP: 300. Alters the properties of a Waystone to create an Amplification, Containment, Dampening, or Refraction effect.
spell.name: Create Waystone Property

spell.description:
Learning XP: 200. CN and learning XP are halved for the following Lores: Witchcraft, Daemonology, Necromancy,
or any Chaos Lore. Imbues an item with a magical ability (boon) and a dangerous side-effect (bane).
spell.name: Cursecraft

spell.description: Learning XP: 100.  Imbues staff with magical symbology.
spell.name: Imbue Staff

spell.description: Learning XP: 400. Has CN equal to Daemon's Willpower. Summons a Daemon inside the Octagram.
spell.name: Invocate Daemon

spell.description: Learning XP: 400. Marsh matter and vegetation coalesce into the form of a Fenbeast.
spell.name: Materialise the Living Swamp

spell.description: Learning XP: 400. Removes Curse from the item (both boon and bane). The item retains Magical Quality.
spell.name: Remove Curse

spell.description: Learning XP: 400. CN is equal to Undead entity's Willpower. Creates a barrier that cannot be crossed by Undead creatures.
spell.name: The Crossed Scythes

spell.description: Lifts the target 2 yards above the ground. It gets 2 Entangled Conditions with a Strength equal to your Willpower.
spell.name: Abulla's Snare

spell.description: The ground forms a hill 20 yards in diameter and 5 yards tall. Characters in the affected area have to take a a Challenging (+0) Dodge Test. They take 20 Damage to a random body location if they fail and 10 Damage if they pass. The hill is permanent.
spell.name: Assault of Stone

spell.description: You open a crack in the ground. Affected targets have to pass a Challenging (+0) Dodge Test to avoid falling in. When the spell ends, the crack closes crushing everyone inside for 20 Damage and burying them alive. Buried targets are subject to Suffocation.
spell.name: Crevasse

spell.description: A burst of purest light makes everyone in the affected area gain 1 Blinded Condition unless they possess the Arcane Magic (Light) Talent. All Daemons also gain 1 Stunned Condition.
spell.name: Dazzling Brightness

spell.description: Provides the target with clarity and resolve. They get +2 SL to all Tests to resist Charm and Intimidation. If you cast it at yourself you may chose to receive +2 SL to Charm Tests instead.
spell.name: Driving Intent

spell.description: You raise the ground to create a crude wall. It counts as Hard Cover and Earthwork. Multiple castings can be use to create a building. It will collapse in Willpower Bonus + SL days unless you have or get an advice from someone with Lore - Engineering or Trade - Stoneworker skills.
spell.name: Erect the Edifice

spell.description: You can see Winds of Magic more clearly. You can see corruption (how many points) and mutations in civilised species, but not in plants or animals. You can see if creatures have Corrupted Trait. You also suffer -2 SL to vision-based Perception Tests and gain +20 bonus to Second Sight Tests to read the winds.
spell.name: Eyes of Volans

spell.description: Pale hands from the ground grab Targets' feet. Any target that fails a Challenging (+0) Dodge Test, becomes Grappled with a Strength equal to your Willpower.
spell.name: Hands of Karkora

spell.description: You illuminate inside of a building with daylight. Daemons and Undead must pass Challenging (+0) Willpower Test to enter the building. It they enter, they suffer Casting SL Damage that ignores Toughness Bonus and Armour.
spell.name: Illuminate the Edifice

spell.description: Enchants a light source. Everyone within light source gains Resistance - Disease Talent. All Wizards receive SL bonus to dispel Dark and Chaos magic. Range and duration are determined by the light source but cannot be more than 1 mile and 1 day.
spell.name: Light of Purity

spell.description: Allows to locate a desired scroll, tome, or grimoire, causing it to glow for Willpower Bonus + SL Rounds. It also contributes 1 + SL towards the target SL of an Extended Research Test.
spell.name: Meissnerâ€™s Instantaneous Librarian

spell.description: Allows you to telekinetically move an object with Encumbrance of up to Willpower Bonus + SL at a speed of Willpower Bonus. It also reduces by 1 level any Corruption Tests resulting from exposure to the object.
spell.name: Orb of Hysh

spell.description: Lets you understand almost any language. The exceptions are Dark Tongue and some obscure ancient languages. Even though you understand it, you cannot communicate in it.
spell.name: Perfect Comprehension

spell.description: Surrounds you with a magical field. Physical melee and missile attacks inflict only SL Wounds instead of their normal Damage. Magical attacks are unaffected. It completely protects you from other types of Damage (fire, falling, etc.). You can't hide while this spell lasts.
spell.name: Pierce the Veil

spell.description: Alters the time. All allies in the affected area receive an extra action. Bonus actions are executed in initiative order.
spell.name: Time Amok

spell.description: Creates bridge with length and breadth equal to your WP Bonus yards. For every +2 SL you can increase width of breadth by your WP Bonus yards.
spell.name: Bridge

spell.description: Reduce any metal armour by 2 AP on every location.
spell.name: Armour of Tin

spell.description: Grant you insight about the target. You know the creature or object as if you were studying it for a day. For every +2 SL learn a new detail. If casted on a magical object that you are touching, it has the same effect as Detect Artefact Talent.
spell.name: Breach the Unknown

spell.description: Turns a non-magical metal object into rust making it useless. If you achieve +4 SL, the spell can also affect non-metal objects by making them brittle for WP Bonus minutes. Can be cast on object of 1 Encumbrance + 1 Encumbrance for each +2 SL.
spell.name: Curse of Rust

spell.description: Changes the composition of a metal weapon making it worse. While the spell lasts, all Qualities are disabled and it gets -1 SL to Tests to this with it. Flaws Dangerous fumbles on an 8, 9, or doubles, Reload time is doubled, Slow provides +2 SL to defenders. Magical weapons are unaffected. However if you get +4 SL, their enchantments are temporarily negated.
spell.name: Fault of Form

spell.description: Creates golden sphere. Those inside are affected by Golden Touch spell.
spell.name: Gehennaâ€™s Golden Globe

spell.description: Creates a cage with bars made out of gold. Bars can be bend apart by passing a Hard (-20) Strength Test or cut with tools.
spell.name: Gilded Cage

spell.description: The next living creature you touch changes into golden statue unless they pass a Challenging (+0) Willpower Test. When petrified, they have 10 Toughness Bonus. If they receive any Wounds, the spell ends immedietly.
spell.name: Golden Touch

spell.description: Reinforces object with a golden cover. It increases its Armour by 4. Taking cover behind the object reduces Corruption by 2 levels and grants +1 SL to Dispel Tests made against spells targeting you.
spell.name: Goldsteel Shielding

spell.description: You can inscribe a metal surface by passing your hand over it. With +2 SL, you can encode it as a Secret Rune. Can also be use as a magic missile with Damage +2.
spell.name: Inscription

spell.description: Gives you an insight into a puzzle/riddle. Get 1 extra hint for each +2 SL. Relevant Lore Tests also receive a bonus of +2 SL
spell.name: Knot Untied

spell.description: Can be used to either repaid a damaged metal item (of any size) or fuse objects together.
spell.name: Metal Mended

spell.description: Affected targets gain a magical, weightless armour giving them Ward (4+) Creature Trait.
spell.name: Meteoric Ironclad

spell.description: All Channel and Cast Test suffer from -1 SL. When the spell expires, you may add +1 to a single Casting Test of spell of any colour. The bonus expires after 2 Rounds if not used.
spell.name: Prismatic Refraction of Habermas

spell.description: Affected compass behaves as a Compass of Meteoric Silver
spell.name: Puchta's Silver Compass

spell.description: Creates any simple object of up to 4 Encumbrance plus 1 for every +2 SL. It functions normally but a skilled person can recognise it's not natural. When spell expires, the object disappears. Alternatively, it conjures 1d10 Gold coins, plus 1d10 coins per +2 SL.
spell.name: Replication of Levorg

spell.description: Chose a Skill. The target receives +2 SL to the next Test of that skill. If you achieved +2 SL on the Casting Test, the target also gets 1 re-roll of that Test.
spell.name: Trial and Error

spell.description: You spend a day studying an area's natural flow of magic. After this time you can predict major seasonal and weather events. With +2 SL you can tell which week they will occur and with +4 SL you can tell the exact day.
spell.name: Almanac

spell.description: Thousands of tiny earth spirits try to pull enemies to into the ground. If they don't pass Strength Test, they are pulled undergrounds and trapped in a "space between worlds" for 1d10 hours. After re-emerging they need to pass a Test for Moderate Exposure to Corruption.
spell.name: Dwellers Below

spell.description: Turns target into a living stone. They can't talk and don't have to breathe. Their movement is halved, they get +30 to Strength and Toughness, and +4 AP to all locations. Unwilling targets can try to resist the spell by making an Opposed Willpower Test.
spell.name: Flesh of Stone

spell.description:
Summons a blood forest on a patch of earth. Anyone standing in the AoE takes 10 Damage and receives Bleeding Condition. Anyone passing the blood forest at more than half of their Movement speed, must pass a Challenging (+0) Agility Test
or suffer a Bleeding Condition.
spell.name: Gardenerâ€™s Warcry

spell.description: Summons a geyser that deals magic missile Damage + 4 to targets in the AoE. They also get knocked back WP Bonus yards in a direction of your choice, and receive Prone Condition. For every +2 SL you can give any single target a Stunned Condition.
spell.name: Geyser

spell.description: Awakes and/or invigorates plant-based creatures. They immediately heal SL Wounds and get +SL to all Tests. If the creatures were dormant, they have to wait 1 round before they can act.
spell.name: Invigorating Chant

spell.description: Temporarily reanimate a recently deceased (within last hour) creature. It can't speak and has its maximum Wounds, and obeys simple commands. It does not count as Undead.
spell.name: Jade Casket

spell.description: Surrounds you with swirling leaves. Reduces Damage from falling, crushing, and blunt weapons by 3. Missile attacks against you suffer -2 SL, and you get Contortionist Talent.
spell.name: Leaf Fall

spell.description:
Lets you sense nearby leylines and stone
circles. It gives +2 SL to Navigation Tests to finds leylines. You can sense leyline's strength and number of waystones in stone circles.
spell.name: Leyfinding

spell.description: Lets you telepathically communicate with minor river or tree spirits.
spell.name: Natureâ€™s Whisper

spell.description: Everyone in the AoE gains Strider - Woodlands Talent or +1 to its level if they already had it. For each +2 SL gain 1 more level of Strider. If you achieved +4 SL you can pass without trace.
spell.name: Paranothâ€™s Pathway

spell.description: A misty spiral staircase lifts you up WP yards. The height can be increased by additional WP yards for every +2 SL. While above you gain 3 AP to all locations.
spell.name: Spiral Stair

spell.description: All characters and surfaces in the affected area become completely fire resistant and any fires are immediately extinguished.
spell.name: Vaunted Transmogrification of Colchis

spell.description: Brings back targets killed within the last minute. They have to take Test for Moderate Exposure to Corruption. Cannot heal critical Wounds, lost limbs, or bring back decapitated bodies.
spell.name: Verdant Apotheosis

spell.description: Target plant instantly grows to its maximum height. For +2/4/6 SL and extra 1/2/3 rounds of concentration casting the spell, you can double/triple/quadruple the maximum height.
spell.name: Vital Growth

spell.description: Transform target into a tree. While in a tree form, they can see and hear normally. Unwilling targets can attempt an Average (+20) WP Test to resist the spell.
spell.name: Wood Shape

spell.description: You surround yourself with a sphere of blades. Anyone engaged in Melee with you takes 3 hits of 8 Damage to random location every round during their turn. Cannot be dodged or parried. Special rules apply to enemies using long weapons.
spell.name: Azure Blades

spell.description: Target suffers -10 to all Tests. Only 1 curse can be placed on any target at the same time. If you achieve +6 SL, you may chose to cast Fate of Doom instead. It makes the target permanently lose 1 Fate point.
spell.name: Curse of Fate

spell.description: You can chose 1 of 3 effects. Learn the best time for a future action. Locate lost or stolen object. Modify a single future die roll by plus or minus 10.
spell.name: Divination

spell.description: You cannot be Surprised.
spell.name: Enemy Foreseen

spell.description: All friendly wizards within the AoE (not including yourself) may reroll their first failure on all Channelling, Casting, and Dispel Tests.
spell.name: Fantastic Foresight

spell.description: Forces all enemy wizards within the AoE to roll twice on any Channelling, Casting, and Dispel Tests. They have to select the worse roll.
spell.name: Solmannâ€™s Discombobulation

spell.description: You can sense target's intentions or destiny. If you touch them, you can chose to see their Dooming and curses instead.
spell.name: Fate Illuminated

spell.description: A crystal disc appears and follows you around. When you look through it, you are able to see objects and creatures up to 3 miles away clearly. Gives a +2 bonus to any Perception Tests that involve long distances and eliminates penalties for clouds and fog. If you use it to look at stars, receive a +2 bonus on your next Navigation Test.
spell.name: Lens on the Sky

spell.description: Select 4 random vortex spells or groups of enemies to push them away from you. The distance is equal to your WP Bonus yards and can be increased by WP Bonus yards per +2 SL. Enemies that hit an obstacle or another character take 7 damage and become Prone.
spell.name: Let the Four Winds Blow!

spell.description: Shoot frigid Azyr from your hand in a chosen direction, hitting all targets within range for 12 damage (ignores Armour but not Toughness Bonus) and forcing them to roll a Hard (-20) Endurance test or suffer first stage of Cold Exposure.
spell.name: Mistral From the Stratosphere

spell.description: Communicate with a distant target via mirror or similar reflecting surface. Your reflection becomes visible and your voice can be heard from the target's mirror, and vice versa. You must know the target's name or have met them before.
spell.name: Mystic Mirror

spell.description: Clean a glass object to make it spotless. With +2 SL, if the object is a lens or widow, it improves Lore (Astronomy) observation by +20. With +4 SL, it enhances visual Perception Tests using Second Sight Talent by +20.
spell.name: Polish and Glean

spell.description: Separate your spirit from your body, which remains in a deep sleep. Your spirit is invisible and can pass through solid obstacles but cannot cast spells, communicate or manipulate objects. If you do not return to your body before the spell expires, you wake up and must Test against a Moderate Exposure to Corruption.
spell.name: Project Spirit

spell.description: Summon a 4-yard wide and 3-yard high arch of sapphire. Anything passing through it disappears into a limbo dimension and the arch vanishes after at the end of your next round. Next time you cast this spell, those inside return to the same spot without noticing time passed. If you die before recasting, they return at the original location, with Stunned and Prone Condition.
spell.name: Sapphire Arch

spell.description: Create a soft glow of light around you, revealing invisible targets and banishing darkness (normal and magical) within the AoE. It also reveals concealed creatures and doors, and moves with you for the duration of the spell.
spell.name: Starshine

spell.description: Your body emits bolts of lightning equal to 2x your I Bonus. Each bolt is a magic missile with +6 Damage that you can direct at separate targets in front of you. You are immediately receive a Stunned Condition and anyone who see you without Arcane Lore - Heavens Talent must Test against a Fear (1). A safer variant calls down I Bonus lightning bolts within a target area of 2x your WP Bonus yards, without stunning or causing fear.
spell.name: Storm of Shemtek
spell.target: 2 x Initiative Bonus or Initiative Bonus

spell.description: Summon a tornado that causes violent havoc, hitting targets within the AoE with magic missile of Damage +8 and blowing them in a random direction, as per the rules of "Let the Four Winds Blow!" spell.
spell.name: Thorsen's Thunderstorm

spell.description:
Target must pass a Challenging (+0) Willpower Test or they become confused. Roll 1d10 for confusion effect: 
1-2: Must pass a Challenging (+0) Willpower Test to take actions.
3-4: Move in a random direction.
5-6: Charge and Attack the nearest target.
7-8: Can only stand still and Dodge.
9-10: Receive Prone condition and become Helpless.
spell.name: Bewilder

spell.description: Summon ghostly shade to haunt a shadowed area, causing Fear (1). +2 SL on Casting Test increases Fear rating by 1 (max Fear 4). Shadow becomes magical, remains shadowed even when illuminated.
spell.name: Black Horrors

spell.description: Transport willing targets through air with shadows to a destination within line of sight up to WP yards (from start). You can fly with group if in AoE. Targets can't fly through solid objects, but they can fly over obstacles up to WP yards. Group arrives when spell expires.
spell.name: Bridge of Shadows

spell.description: Make enemies dance uncontrollably and lose focus. They can resist with a WP Test. If they fail, thy can't move or take any actions. To stop dancing, they must pass a Hard (-20) Athletics Test or Challenging Perform (Dance) Test. After the spell expires affected targets gain Fatigued Condition. Does not affect friendly and neutral characters.
spell.name: Dance of Despair

spell.description: Hide object in a pocket dimension. It becomes weightless and invisible. Containers with contents count as 1 object. Object must have Encumbrance of 1 + 1 for every +2 SL on Casting Test. The object cannot be found with Perception Tests. You can retrieve with an Action. The item is lost if spell duration ends before retrieval.
spell.name: Deep Pockets

spell.description: The Grand Illusion functions similarly to "Illusion" spell but it creates complete sensory illusions, including scent, touch, sound, taste, and appearance, not just static scenes. The illusion is real (has physical effects) to those who believe it.
spell.name: Grand Illusion

spell.description: Summon grey birds to teleport you or one target up to 100 yards +100 yards for every +2 SL on Casting Test. Unwilling targets can Dodge with Easy (+40) Test.
spell.name: Grey Wings

spell.description: Invoke horn blast affecting all in range. Friendly targets +2 SL bonus on Cool and Leadership Tests. Enemies get -2 SL on same tests and must pass Fear (1) Test. Neutral targets are unaffected.
spell.name: Horn of Andar

spell.description:
Create sound dampening aura that moves with target. Can't be cast on unwilling target, but can target objects. Select 1 of 3 forms at casting time:
No sounds leave AoE but sounds from outside can enter it.
No sounds enter AoE but sounds made inside AoE are unaffected.
No sounds are made in AoE.
spell.name: Hush

spell.description:
Change the appearance of a target. Those who do not consent can resist with Opposed Willpower Test. Select from the available options:
+/- 10 Fel
Target appears to be dead. They cannot speak or move.
Target becomes unrecognisable to the people who know them.
spell.name: Mutable Visage

spell.description: Open a dark pit in the ground. Targets near the pit must pass a (+0) Dodge Test or fall in. The pit closes when the spell ends, causing 20 damage and burying those inside alive causing Suffocation.
spell.name: Pit of Tarnus

spell.description: Creates an illusion in the past that changes the presence. You can teleport a terrain feature such at tree boulder etc. as long as it is smaller than a house. It cannot be a famous landmark and the new location must be sensible. Characters occupying the terrain feature teleport along with it.
spell.name: Ribauld's Retroactive Illusion

spell.description: Revels shadows of all creature, even those invisible. Possessed creatures have 2 shadows: their own and the daemon. Attacks against revealed creatures have -10 penalty.
spell.name: Shadow Grove

spell.description: Make a target invisible and intangible if fully within a shadow. Can be cast on inanimate objects. Material attacks don't affect it, but magical ones do. The target can interact with physical objects but the spell ends if it leaves the shadow.
spell.name: Substance of Shadow

spell.description: Make an enemy treat you as an ally if they fail an Opposed Willpower Test. They can break the spell by passing a Challenging (+0) Cool Test when asked to attack a former ally, but won't follow suicidal orders. On a neutral target, it grants +2 SL to Fellowship Tests instead.
spell.name: Traitor of Tarn

spell.description: Allows you to control your detached shadow and see, hear, and smell from it. Directing its movement takes an Action. It is destroyed by direct sunlight or if it moves beyond 48 yards from a light source. It causes Fear (1) but cannot attack.
spell.name: Wandering Shadow

spell.description: Friendly targets become immune to Fear and Terror is treated as Fear instead for the duration of the spell. All Psychology effects caused by grief are permanently removed. If cast on enemies, if they fail a Challenging (+0) Cool Test, they cannot flee combat.
spell.name: Acceptance of Fate
