spell.description: The Critical Hit rolls against you are modified by -10. You gain Resistance to Poison, Disease, and Chaos Talents. If you already have these Talents, gain +1 level per +2 SL instead.
spell.name: Amaranth

spell.description: Trap target's soul in a bottle.Their body stays in coma until the bottle is re-opened nearby. Body has to be fed or it will die. When awakened, the target must Test for exposure to a Moderate Source of Corruption.
spell.name: Animus Imprisoned

spell.description: Summon a swirling ball of dust. Affected targets are dealt 8 Damage ignoring Armour and start to Suffocate until they leave the cloud. With +4 SL, you summon Purple Sun of Xereus at the centre of the cloud. It causes Fear (2) and anything that touches it must pass a Challenging (+0) Cool Test or die instantly.
spell.name: Ashes and Dust

spell.description:
Command creatures with Undead and Ethereal Traits. Chose 1 of the 2 effects: 
Command all targets that fail Opposed Willpower Test.
Summon SL number of Ghosts. They are not under you command but you can subdue them by casting this spell again.
spell.name: Compel Spirits

spell.description:
Trap targets in Aethyr maze. At the end of their rounds, each one rolls 1d10:
1-3: They return to  original location.
4-6: Roll again next round.
7-9: Is lost for 1d10 hours and must  resist a Moderate Exposure to Corruption when they return.
10: Lost forever.
spell.name: Crystal Maze

spell.description: Undead and Ethereal creatures must pass a Challenging (+0) Cool Test each round or become Stunned. Spirits with 3 Stunned Conditions are freed from the mortal realm.
spell.name: Deathâ€™s Release

spell.description:
Causes the targets to laugh hysterically. Each round they must pass a Challenging (+0) Cool Test or suffer their own S Bonus + 6 Damage (50% chance on head, 50% on body) and receive Stunned Condition. For every +2 SL one you may surround 1 target with a purple fog. If they fail a a Challenging (+0) Willpower
Test, the fog starts Suffocating them for the duration for the spell.
spell.name: Fate of Bjuna

spell.description: Gain +10 S for every +1 SL and automatically succeed on all grapple attacks.
spell.name: Iyrtu's Embrace

spell.description:
If cast on a person's limb, it becomes completely useless and counts as amputated for WP Bonus minutes. 
Can also be cast as a ward on a grave. Whoever tries to uncover it, becomes subject to a curse that affects a random limb for WP Bonus days.
spell.name: Limbwither

spell.description: You become cognisant of all deaths that happened within the last month + 1 month for each +1 SL. If you are aware of a deceased person's name, you can ask them one question per additional +2 SL, which must be able to be answered through knocks.
spell.name: Shyish Uncovered

spell.description: You grant supernatural speed to yourself or another target, allowing them to move 100 yards and take an action in the next round. If killed while under the spell's effect, the target can take an immediate bonus action before death.
spell.name: Speed of Lykos

spell.description:
A single (primary) target must Test for Minor
Exposure to Corruption and then pass a Challenging (+0) Cool Test or receive an Unconscious Condition. All enemies in I Bonus yards of primary target must pass an Average (+20) Cool Test or receive a Stunned Condition. Anyone that did not pass the Cool Test, must pass an Easy (+40) Cool Test or receive a Fatigued Condition and Psychology - Despair.
spell.name: Taste of Death

spell.description: Lets you telepathically send message to another r Amethyst wizard. Receiver of the message must pass a Challenging (+0) Intuition Test to understand you. It can also be used to read mind of another Amethyst Wizard. If they pass a Challenging (+0) Intelligence Test, they notice what you are doing and can try to block you with an Opposed Willpower Test.
spell.name: Telepathy

spell.description: If used on a non-magical object it instantly ages it and it turns to dust. Object can have a max of 2 Encumbrance + 1 for every +2 SL. With more than +4 SL it can be used on living creatures. The creature must pass an Average (+20) Cool Test or grow older in a matter of seconds and permanently lose 1d10 of S and T each. Daemons, Undead, and plants are immune.
spell.name: Tide of Years

spell.description: Summon 2 purple shadow hounds. They're invisible but a Hard (-20) Perception Test reveals them as beasts with sharp fangs. During you round they can attack within 4 yards. They have Weapon Skill 50 and Weapon - Bite (+8) Trait. They cannot be attacked and do not gain Advantage.
spell.name: Wild Kin of Zandox

spell.description: You set your body on fire. Anyone attempting to grab or grapple you suffer 8 + SL Damage. Every turn they must Hard (-20) Cool Test or are forced to let you go. Every time you take damage in melee combat, you attacker must pass Challenging (+0) Dodge Test or suffer a magic missile hit with Damage +3 that ignores Armour
spell.name: Body of Fire

spell.description:
You boil target's blood. If they resist a Difficult
(-10) Endurance Test, they immediately receive 2 Blinded Conditions and at the start of their round they receive 10 + SL Damage that ignores Armour. Anyone killed by this spell explodes. The explosion deals magic missile hit with Damage +1 to everyone within 2 yards.
spell.name: Boiling Blood

spell.description: Create a burning head that strikes all targets in its path. It causes magic missile with Damage + 4 (or +0 passes a Challenging (+0) Dodge Test). Everyone gets 1 Ablaze condition, and if they lose at least 1 Wound, they treat you as if you had Fear (1) Trait.
spell.name: Burning Head

spell.description: Causes a flame to mesmerise 1 random observer that must pass a Challenging (+0) Cool Test or receive 3 Stunned Conditions. With +2 SL you may enchant a bigger fire that affects 2 observers, and with +4 SL you can enchant a massive fire that affects all observers.
spell.name: Captivating Flame

spell.description: Make the target dislike someone else. They are subject to Prejudice for WP bonus hours. If the two are friends, the target may may resist the spell with an Average (+20) Cool Test. With +4 SL the target is subject to Animosity for WP bonus days instead,  and with +8 SL they suffer from Hatred for WP bonus weeks instead.
spell.duration: Willpower Bonus hours, days, or weeks
spell.name: Choleric

spell.description: Summon a pillar of fire 2 yards in diameter and 2 yards high. For each +2 SL you can increase the diameter by 1 yard and height by 2 yards. Anyone standing where the pillar has appeared receives magic missile hit with Damage +8, 3 Ablaze Conditions,  Prone Condition, and are thrown outside of the storm.
spell.name: Flamestorm

spell.description: Empower a forge. All Trade - Smith Tests gain + 1 SL.
spell.name: Forge of Tarnus

spell.description: Set an object or a person on fire. The target receives 2 Ablaze Conditions. If they already have Ablaze Condition, you can distribute 3 Ablaze Conditions to others withing 2 yards of the target instead.
spell.name: Ignite

spell.description: Create a fire (of size of campfire) that cannot be extinguished by any means for WP bonus hours. With +2/4/6 SL the duration is extended to WP bonus days/weeks/months. The only way to extinguish the fire is to cast "Inextinguishable Flame" spell on it. Cannot be dispelled by any other means.
spell.duration: Willpower Bonus hours, days, weeks, or months
spell.name: Inextinguishable Flame

spell.description: Everything in AoE becomes flammable. Everything that is already flammable takes +SL extra fire damage and receives an extra Ablaze Condition when damaged by fire.
spell.name: Kindleflame

spell.description: Summon a minor fire elemental to defend your camp. The elemental has Movement 3, WS equal to your WP, Fear (1) Trait, and attacks at Damage +6. Whenever its attack causes damage, the opponent gets 1 Ablaze Condition. It must stay within 12 yards from the fire and can be destroyed by extinguishing it with a pint of water.
spell.name: Kindred of the Hearth

spell.description: Summon a storm that causes magic missile hit with Damage +12 and inflicts 2 Ablaze Conditions. Every round it moved 8 yards or less it produces + 1 smaller vortex for every +2 SL. They immediately move randomly and last only one round. They inflict 1 Ablaze Condition and magic missile hit with Damage +4.
spell.name: Magma Storm

spell.description: Summons a magic sword that hovers in front of you. For every +2 SL you can summon additional sword up to 6 in total. You can spend you action directing the swords withing line of sight. Any single target can only be attacked by a 1 sword. The swords posses Fly (20) Creature, WS 60, and deal 8 Damage before returning quickly to you.
spell.name: Sanguine Swords

spell.description:
Chose 1 of the 3 effects:
1. Post food becomes extremely spicy.
2. Jug of liquid becomes a strong alcohol.
3.  Flask of liquid becomes a highly flammable oil.
spell.name: Taste of Fire

spell.description: All enemies in the AoE receive a Fatigued Condition every round they attempt to run, charge, or flee. If they are touched by any fire, they receive Ablaze Condition. In addition they suffer extra +SL Damage when subjected to fire damage.
spell.name: Withering Heat

spell.description: Create a blazing storm that deals 8 + SL Damage per round to all targets in AoE. Every round they must pass a Challenging (+0) Athletics Test or receive Prone Condition. Flammable objects have 25% chance to ignite each round.
spell.name: Ygethmor's Flaming Blizzard

spell.description: Transform target into an amber statue. They can try to resist by passing a Hard (-20) Cool Test. The spell ends if the statue is attacked but the first attack does not do damage. A willing target can enter a state of extended hibernation that lasts until the next equinox or solstice.
spell.name: Amber Trance

spell.description:
Deals magic missile hit with Damage
+4 to all targets. Everyone in the AoE must also pass an Average (+20) Dodge Test or receive Bleeding and Entangled (Strength 30) Conditions.
spell.name: Awakening of the Wood

spell.description: You make a domestic animal become wild. With +4 SL you can cast in on Humans. Humans can try to resist with a Difficult (-10) Willpower Test. The target grow thick body hair, lose speech, and starts behaving like a wild animal. The spell lasts until dispelled.
spell.name: Beast Unbroken

spell.description: Summon small spirits to harass foes in AoE, causing -2 to Movement, and -20 to WS, BS, and Agi. Targets that leave AoE are followed by the spirits but suffer only -1/-10 penalties. Mounts are scared away and flee unless they pass a Challenging (+0) Cool Test.
spell.name: Curse of Anraheir

spell.description: The target can see through your eyes.
spell.name: Eyes of the Pack

spell.description: Gain +20 to Track and Perception Tests that rely on smell, including Second Sight Tests to smell magic. You can also smell Corruption and Mutation in plants. animals, and animal dung.
spell.name: Follow Scent

spell.description: You howl at a moon to invigorate all allies (and yourself) in the AoE. Everyone gains + 1 Movement and +10 to Strength and Toughness.
spell.name: Hunter's Moons

spell.description: All allies in the AoE gain +30 to Strength and Toughness (up to max 100). This spell does not affect you.
spell.name: Merciw's Monstrous Regiment

spell.description:
Create a foul smelling musk. If you use it on character or object, you gain +2 SL to locate it later. Alternatively, you can mark an area (up to WP Bonus yards) as your territory. Wild animals will only enter if they are desperate and pass an Average
(+20) Cool Test. The smell lasts for 1 day + extra day for every +2 SL.
spell.name: Musk Spray

spell.description: Gain +1 Movement and Scale Sheer Surface and Strider (any one) Talents. If you already have them add 1 level + 1 more for each +2 SL. Gain +10 on Tests to avoid Entangled Conditions.
spell.name: Quick Passage

spell.description: Summon a wild animal to serve as your mount. You temporarily gain the Ride Skill for this animal equal to your Language - Magick Skill.
spell.name: Summon Mount

spell.description: Makes allies immune to Fear and Terror. Immediately remove 1 + SL Broken Condition from all allies.
spell.name: The Ox Stands

spell.description: Transform yourself into a Large on Enormous Beast. If you achieve +4 SL or more, you can chose an optional Creature Trait or cast this spell on someone else instead. If you cast it on someone else, they can resist with an Opposed Willpower Test.
spell.name: Transformation of Kadon

spell.description: Create an amber light aura that protects you against non-magical attacks. Every time attack successfully hits you, make a Challenging (+0) Cool Test. If you pass the Test, reduce damage taken by WP Bonus + SL. If the attack is reduced to 0, it is deflected. Deflected Ranged attacks hit a random target within 2 yards of you and deflected Melee attacks hit the attacker.
spell.name: Vengeful Hood

spell.description: Grow thick fur that protects you against attacks and cold. You are immune to Cold Exposure and Critical Hit rolls are reduced by 10. You also suffer -10 to Fel and Ag.
spell.name: Winter Coat

spell.description: Summons a huge worm that wriggles to the target. The target suffers an Entangled Condition and it is Grappled (Strength 50). If the target loses grappling Opposed Strength Test, the worm can either add another Entangled Condition or dissolve 1 point of leather armour on all locations.
spell.name: Writhing Worm

spell.description: You crunch bones and deal magic missile +4 Damage that ignores AP. If it causes Critical Wound, add +20 to critical table roll.
spell.name: Bonecrusher

spell.description: You consume a heart to give target +2 SB when determining Damage. When the spell ends, the target has to have a large meal or suffer a Fatigued Condition. Unwilling targets may try to oppose this spell with Difficult (+20) Cool Test.
spell.name: Bullgorger

spell.description: You devour an entire head to gain Fear 2 Creature Trait. If the late owner of the devoured head had a close relationship to someone who is affected by your Fear Trait, they make any Cool Tests to resist the Fear at a -20 penalty.
spell.name: Braingobbler

spell.description: You consume a part of a corpse to learn how and when the creature died.
spell.name: Taste Death

spell.description: Give the target Regenerate Creature Trait. If the target is not an Ogre, when regenerating wounds, they pass an Average (+20) Endurance Test or the regenerated flesh will become green or blue (similar to Troll's skin).
spell.name: Trollguts

spell.description: You devour a large beast to summon the Maw. Anyone in the AoE must take a Challenging (+0) Dodge Test. If they pass, they take Damage +8 hit with Damage reduced by 1 for each Dodge Test SL. Those who fail, fall in the Maw. They gain 3 Entangled Conditions (Strength 60) and take a Damage +10 hit. They cannot escape until all Entangled Conditions are removed. At the end of their turn they suffer Damage +10 hit.
spell.name: The Maw

spell.description: You bathe a blade into the he blood of a freshly fallen foe. Any creatures you chose in AoE gain Vampiric Creature Trait. To benefit from it they only need to wound someone in melee combat (instead of biting). Unwilling targets may try to oppose it with a Difficult (+20) Endurance Test.
spell.name: Feast of the Fallen

spell.description: Transform a stick into a dagger. It counts as Magical. Used against enemies with Ethereal or Corrupted Traits, it has SB + 8 instead of regular SB + 2. After the spell duration ends, you can keep the dagger by passing a Challenging (+0) Channelling Test every round.
spell.name: Dagger of the Art

spell.description: You whittle a staff that acts as a ward against Beastmen. If any Beastmen come withing 100 yards, they receive a Broken Condition unless they pass a Challenging (+0) Cool Test.
spell.name: Fellstave - Beastmen

spell.description: You whittle a staff that acts as a ward against Daemons. If any Daemons come withing 100 yards, they receive a Broken Condition unless they pass a Challenging (+0) Cool Test.
spell.name: Fellstave - Daemons

spell.description: You whittle a staff that acts as a ward against Orcs and Goblins. If any Orcs or Goblins come withing 100 yards, they receive a Broken Condition unless they pass a Challenging (+0) Cool Test.
spell.name: Fellstave - Orcs and Goblins

spell.description: You whittle a staff that acts as a ward against Ogres. If any Ogres come withing 100 yards, they receive a Broken Condition unless they pass a Challenging (+0) Cool Test.
spell.name: Fellstave - Ogres

spell.description: You whittle a staff that acts as a ward against Fimir. If any Fimir come withing 100 yards, they receive a Broken Condition unless they pass a Challenging (+0) Cool Test.
spell.name: Fellstave - Fimir

spell.description: You whittle a staff that acts as a ward against Trolls. If any Trolls come withing 100 yards, they receive a Broken Condition unless they pass a Challenging (+0) Cool Test.
spell.name: Fellstave - Trolls

spell.description: You whittle a staff that acts as a ward against Undead. If any Undead come withing 100 yards, they receive a Broken Condition unless they pass a Challenging (+0) Cool Test.
spell.name: Fellstave - Undead

spell.description: All Fel Test receive +10 bonus. Animosity and Hatred Psychologies have no effect.
spell.name: Goodwill

spell.description: Target ignores all Fatigued Conditions.
spell.name: Invigorate

spell.description: When you cast this spell honey drips from your lips. You must catch it in a cup. Whoever drinks from the cup, they fall in love in the first person they would find romanticallly appaeling.
spell.name: Lovelock

spell.description: You create a crop of purple herbs and put them in a pouch. The pouch provides wearer with +1 SL to any Cool Tests to resist supernatural effects and +1 SL to Endurance Tests to resist contracting diseases or suffering from Poisoned Conditions.
spell.name: Protection Pouch

spell.description: Over the course of the spell you find 1d10 pennies.
spell.name: Silvertide

spell.description: The creature with Ethereal or Daemonic Trait must pass a Challenging (+0) WP Test or suffer a number of Wounds equal to your WP Bonus. If this reduces their Wounds to 0 or belowe they are banished and canot return for 1d10 years.
spell.name: The Ousting

spell.description: If you secceed an Opposed WP Test with the target, they receive -2 SL to any spell casting Tests from the Lores of Witchcraft, Necromancy, Daemonology, and all Chaos Lores.
spell.name: Wyrd Ward

spell.description: Cover ship with seaweed. It suffers -2 to Movement and and adjusts its Manoeuvre Characteristic by -3 SL.
spell.name: Living Mire

spell.description: Replenish all empty barrels of water on the ship.
spell.name: Water Water Everywhere

spell.description: Create a whirpool (Gentle Rotation) in the target area. Can be overcasted: 5 SL Whirpool, 8 SL Powerful Vortex, 13 A Maelstorm, 21 The Maelstrom.
spell.name: Whirlpool

spell.description: +2 SL to all Navigation Tests made by you individually or as part of a Crew.
spell.name: Blessings of Bel Shanaar

spell.description: +1 SL to Tests made to fire a ship's cannon.
spell.name: Niezlib's Optimal Firing Solution

spell.description: Apply the Doldrums effect from the Wind Effect Table to your ship.
spell.name: Sea of Glass

spell.description: Deal magic missile with Damage +5 to all affected targets. Each target must pass a Challenging (+0) Endurance Test, or gain 1 Corruption.
spell.name: Blast of Corruption

spell.description: Deal magic missile with Damage +6. The target must pass a Challenging (+0) Endurance Test, or gain 1 Corruption.
spell.name: Bolt of Corruption

spell.description:
Your body transforms and assumes aspects of a
Daemon loyal to your patron god. The trait is determined by 1d10 roll on the table on page 78. Each +2 SL lets you roll again and increase the duration. When the spell should end, you may make a WP Test to extend the Duration for+1 Round.
spell.name: Daemonic Mien

spell.description: Invisible minor daemons will carry your message (max 25 words). For every +2 SLs, you may double the length of the message.
spell.name: Foul Messenger

spell.description: Make the target to appear without flaw. It hides any scars, deformities and Mutations. When the spell should end, you may make a Willpower Test to extend the Duration for +1 Round.
spell.name: Joyous Aspect

spell.description: You cast this spell on something that belongs to the target. The object causes the target to become obsessed with something that depends on the individual and your Lore. Every hour the target must pass a an Average (+20) Endurance Test every hour, or succumb to their obsession.
spell.name: Obsession

spell.description: Spells being cast in the AoE have their CN cost halved. The casting Tests have Average (+20) Difficulty. Everyone in the AoE must pass an Average (+20) Endurance at the end of each Rounds or they gain 1 Corruption point.
spell.name: Power of Chaos

spell.description: You open a portal to the Realms of Chaos. At the end of every Round, 1 + 1 for every +5 SL Lesser Daemons come through the portal. When the spell should end, you may make a WP Test to extend the Duration for+1 Round.
spell.name: Rend Aethyr

spell.description: You ask you god to take the soul of your target. You must win an Opposed Willpower Test  by at least 2+ SL. If you Fumble the Test, your soul is taken instead.
spell.name: Slave to Darkness

spell.description: Choose one Spell from any Lore. For the duration of the Boon of Tzeentch, you can cast the selected Spell as if you had memorised it.
spell.name: Boon of Tzeentch

spell.description:
Make palms of the targetâ€™s hands turn a deep
purple. Last 1 hour for every SL. To cast it, you must have some small amount matter from the target. Used to discipline Purple Hand co-conspirators.
spell.name: The Purple Hand

spell.description: Make an opposed WP Test. If won, the target forgets a randomly selected spell for 1 day for every SL of the opposed Test.
spell.name: Curse of Tzeentch

spell.description: Targets in the AoE suffer magic missile hit (Damage +3) and gain 1 Ablaze Condition. If Wounds of a target with size Small or larger are reduced to 0,  roll 1d10. If you roll 9, the target dies and 2 Blue Horrors come out of its burning flesh.
spell.name: Blue Fire of Tzeentch

spell.description: The Target suffers magic missile hit (Damage +7) and must pass a a Challenging (+0) Endurance or gain 1 Corruption point. On a fumble, the target immediately rolls for a Mutation, and gains the Chaos Magic - Tzeentch Talent.
spell.name: Bolt of Change

spell.description: Conjure a torrent of magical fire. Every living creature and Daemons that can see it can reroll every Test once, as if they had spent a Fortune Point. Each time they do it, the must pass a Challenging (+0) Endurance Test or gain 1 Corruption point. When the spell should end, you may make a WP Test to extend the Duration for+1 Round.
spell.name: The Flickering Flames of Fickle Fate

spell.description: Gain a Fortune point (for the duration of the spell) for every positive SL. If the casting fails, gain 1 Corruption point for every negative SL.
spell.name: Master of Fortune

spell.description: The target must pass a Challenging (+0) Cool Test, or gain 1 Corruption point + 1 more for each 2 SL. If the target reaches Mutation threshold, they roll on Mental Mutations table and gain 1 Ablaze Condition.
spell.name: Mindfire

spell.description: The target suffers magic missile hit (Damage +6) and gains 1 Ablaze Condition. If Wounds of a target with size Small or larger are reduced to 0, roll 1d10. If you roll 9, the target dies and 1 Pink Horror comes out of its writhing corpse.
spell.name: Pink Fire of Tzeentch

spell.description: Select a target you can see. You discover the target's Motivation, Short-Term Ambition, and Long-Term Ambition.
spell.name: Sense the Skein

spell.description: The target suffers from Prone Condition, and is considered Helpless for the duration of the Spell. At the end of the duration, they must pass a Challenging (+0) Endurance Test opposed by your Language - Magick Skill. If they lose the Test, they gain 1 Corruption point + 1 for every SL they lost by.
spell.name: Transformation of Tzeentch

spell.description: Targets in the AoE suffer magic missile hit (Damage +9) and gain 1 Ablaze Condition. If Wounds of a target with size Small or larger are reduced to 0, roll 1d10. If you roll 9, the target dies and 2 Pink Horrors come out of its burning flesh.
spell.name: Tzeentch's Firestorm

spell.description: You gain Ward 9+ Creature Trait.
spell.name: Tzeentch's Golden Aura

spell.description:
The target must take Opposed Int Test with you. If they lose, they gain 1 Stunned +1 for each SL they lost by. If they Fumble, they gain the Unconscious Condition and 1 Corruption point.
After all Conditions are removed, they must pass an Average (+20) Endurance Test or gain 1 Corruption Point. If they Fumble, they get 1 mental mutation and cannot not take a Short-term Ambition for the next 1d10 weeks.
spell.name: Word of Tzeentch

spell.description: You can speak and understand Language - Beast Tongue.
spell.name: Beast Tongue

spell.description: Gain Night Vision Creature Trait. If you already have it, your vision range doubles.
spell.name: Eyes of the Beast

spell.description: Beastmen of Tzeentch are friendly to you. Gain +20 Fel to all Tests dealing with them. Followers of Khorne and Slaanesh suffer Animosity towards you. Followers of Nurgle suffer Hatred towards you.
spell.name: Sign of the Beast

spell.description: Gain +10 to one of: WS, T, ag, WP.
spell.name: Bension of Tzeentch

spell.description: Gain Fury Creature Trait.
spell.name: Bestial Rage

spell.description: Fingernails on your hands and feet become claws, allowing you to climb if you are barefoot and without gloves. Gain Scale Sheer Surface Talent.
spell.name: Climb

spell.description: Cause fear in a single ordinary animal. If it fails a WP Test to resist, it acts strangely. The outcomes range from gaining Broken Conditions to instant death. To determine the effect, roll 1d10 on a table from page 98.
spell.name: Enrage Beast

spell.description:
If the target fails WP Test to resist the spell, you gain control over their body. If you try to force them to self-harm, they get another WP Test to try to break the spell. When the spell ends, the victim must make a Challenging (-10) WP Test or gain one
mutation from the Tzeentch column from p 66 of Enemy in Shadows Companion.
spell.name: Slave to Chaos

spell.description: Gain a temporary mutation. Roll 1d10: 1: Animalistic Legs (+1 Movement), 2: Beaked Face (Bite +3 Trait), 3: Claws (Claw +3 Trait), 4: Fur (Armour 1 on all locations), 5: Horns (Horns +4 Trait), 6: Tail (Tail-lash +3 Trait), 7: Webbed Feet (Amphibious Trait), 8: Wings (Flight 60 Trait), 9-10: Roll twice.
spell.name: Gift of the Beast

spell.description: |You touch a non-magic inanimate object. It comes soft and malleable. Weapons bend and break, Armour lose all AP. You can shape this material as you like.
spell.name: Subvert Strength

spell.description: You transform into a Gor (WFRP p. 331). Your characteristics are either your own or that of Gor (whichever is higher). Gain Armour 1, Fury, and Horns +6 Creature Traits. You also gain Language - Beast Tongue but lose ability to speak in any other language.
spell.name: Transformation of the Beast

spell.description: The ground shakes as you stomp. All targets in WP Bonus yards have to make an Ag Test or fall down and gain a Prone Condition.
spell.name: Tremor

spell.description: The target must pass a WP Test or gains one Stunned Condition.
spell.name: Befuddle

spell.description: Add +10 to your Int or Fel characteristics.
spell.name: Blessing of Slaanesh

spell.description: You ignore Fatigued conditions for as long as you do something you enjoy. When you stop, the conditions return and you lose 1 Wound ignoring your TB and armour.
spell.name: Endure Excess

spell.description: You may make one Called Shot against the target without taking the usual -20 penalty.
spell.name: Leer

spell.description: Imbue an object with essence of desire. Anyone who likes that sort of objects with find this one particularly desirable.
spell.name: Lure

spell.description: Your body and clothing become instantly clean. Anyone who pays close attention will notice that details that slightly off. For example, on closer look, your hair looks greasy.
spell.name: Preen

spell.description: You look your target in the eye. If you pass an opposed Intuition/Cool Test, you learn about 1 of target's vices.
spell.name: Sense Vice

spell.description: Reduce target's I to 10. Target's movement becomes random and they have to pass a Challenging (+0) Cool Test to perform any Action.
spell.name: Acquiescence

spell.description: Reduce I of all targets to 10. Their movement becomes random and they have to pass a Challenging (+0) Cool Test to perform any Action.
spell.name: Aura of Acquiescence

spell.description: Targets gains 1 Entangled Condition for each SL.
spell.name: Bonds of Slaanesh

spell.description: The target gains a bonus to one Test equal to your WP, after which the effect ends.
spell.name: Breath of Inspiration

spell.description: Deal magic missile with Damage +6. If it hits the head location, you may inflict Entangled Condition using your WP instead of S for purposes of the Opposed Test. It lasts WP bonus Rounds.
spell.name: Blissful Throes

spell.description: All targets receive Damage +3 hit per SL that ignores Armour.
spell.name: Cacophonic Caress

spell.description: Make an Extended Opposed Cool Test, with 6 required SLs. The winner can hear loser's current Ambition. They also have to pass a Cool Test or gain 1 Corruption point.
spell.name: Careless Whispers

spell.description: The targets rolls once on the Physical or Mental Corruption Tables for each SL.
spell.name: Chaos Spawn

spell.description: The targets rolls on the Head Critical Wounds table. The results is as rolled but there are no broken bones.
spell.name: Cursed Caress

spell.description: Deal magic missile with a Damage of +3 that ignores Armour.
spell.name: Cutting Wit

spell.description: Remove all Broken Conditions from the target. It cannot gain new ones for the duration of the spell.
spell.name: Delicious Excruciation

spell.description: Causes 1 target to sprout horrible, uncontrollable growths. The growths are permanent. When the spell is cast and at the beginning of each round, the target can attempt a Hard (-20) Cool Test to resist the spell. If failed, roll on table on p. 38 to determine effects of the curse during that round.
spell.name: Fleshy Curse

spell.description: Make an Extended Opposed Cool Test, with 6 required SLs. If you win you get full control of target's body. When the spell ends, the target is aware they have been controlled and if they pass a Challenging (+0) Intuition Test, they can tell who controlled them.
spell.name: Flesh Puppet

spell.description: The target gains the Painless Creature Trait. If they suffer a Critical Wound, they must pass an Average (+20) Cool Test or they drop their weapon and stand helplessly.
spell.name: From Pain, Pleasure

spell.description: Deal Damage +5 hit. The target must pass a Challenging (+0) Willpower Test (the difficulty increases by 1 step per SL) or gain a Stunned Condition.
spell.name: Lash of Slaanesh

spell.description: Slaanesh bestows his gift on you. To determine the gift, roll 1d10 on table on p. 39.
spell.name: Gift of Slaanesh

spell.description: All affected targets enter the Frenzy state. They attack nearest creature.
spell.name: Luxurious Torment

spell.description: Remove all Conditions from the target. All their visible wounds are masked for the duration of the spell. They also benefit from +10 to all Fel Tests.
spell.name: Mask of Desire

spell.description: All targets make a Challenging (+0) Cool Test. If they fail, all they can do is dance lewdly. If attacked, they are Surprised for the first round of combat.
spell.name: Pavane of Slaanesh

spell.description: You and your allies gain Distracting Creature Trait.
spell.name: Phantasmagoria

spell.description: Every hour, the target must pass an Average (+20) Cool Test or be overcome by pleasure. On the first failure, they gain 1 Fatigued Condition. On every next failure, they gain 1 Blinded and 1 Deafened Conditions. If the sum of Blinded and Deafened Conditions is equal or greater than their Initiative Bonus, they gain Unconscious Condition. When the spell ends, all Conditions other than the Fatigued Condition are removed.
spell.name: Succubus's Caress

spell.description: Summon a Daemonette that can appear anywhere within spell's range. It is not under your control, but can be bargained with.
spell.name: Summon Daemonette

spell.description: Summon a number of Daemonettes equal to your WP Bonus. They can appear anywhere within spell's range. They are not under your control, but can be bargained with.
spell.name: Summon Daemonette Pack

spell.description: Create an illusion of your enemy's deepest desire. Each Round, all enemies that can see it, must pass a Challenging (+0) WP Test or spend entire Round moving towards it. Those who reach it, must pass a Challenging (+0) WP Test every Round. If they fail, they spend the Round trying to grasp the illusion.
spell.name: Titillating Delusions

spell.description: You weave subtle webs and tie them to an object. You become aware of any creature of size Small or larger that gets within WP Bonus Yards of the object.
spell.name: Snitch

spell.description: Gain 1 Fortune point for the duration of the spell. You can only gain the extra point once every 13 hours.
spell.name: Favour of the Horned Rat

spell.description: Create a small blob of green glowing fire. It burns for 1 hour and gives as much light as a torch. You can throw at an enemy in which case you use Ranged (Throwing) Skill and it does SB + WPB Damage.
spell.name: Ghostly Flame

spell.description: The target must pass a Challenging (+0) Cool Test or gets an ugly weeping sore on their head that reduces all Fellowship Tests by -10.
spell.name: Mark of the Horned Rat

spell.description: Summon a rat that will obey all your commands.
spell.name: Rat Thrall

spell.description:
The target must pass a Challenging (+0) Endurance
Test or they get -20 to all Tests to resist disease. Targets with Resistance - Disease may use it to resist this spell.
spell.name: Vector

spell.description: All creatures in the AoE have to pass a Challenging (+0) Endurance Test or be transformed into Skaven of size appropriate their size.
spell.name: Curse of the Horned Rat

spell.description: Target Skaven becomes subject to Frenzy. Unwilling Skavens may take a Challenging (+0) Cool Test to resist the spell. If they do, they lose 1 Wound as they bite their own body to distract themselves.
spell.name: Death Frenzy

spell.description: Targets become subjects to Terror (1) effect or Terror (2) for Skaven.
spell.name: Musk of Terror

spell.description: Teleport yourself and 1 other creature (of Average size or smaller) to any location you can see within WP yards. Unwilling targets may try to avoid being touched and/or change destination by +SL yards by passing a Difficult (-10) Cool Test.
spell.name: Skitterleap

spell.description: Summon a swarm of rats that you can control for Willpower Bonus rounds. After that, you lose control of them and they move and attack at random. After the spell ends, the rats disperse.
spell.name: Vermintide

spell.description: Create a 1-yard wide crack in the ground that extends Willpower yards  in a straight line in any direction within your line of sight.
spell.name: Crackâ€™s Call

spell.description: Cast a magic missile with a Damage of +4. Struck enemy must make a Challenging (+0) Endurance Test or gain 1 Stunned Condition for each SL.
spell.name: Crackling Doom

spell.description: Cast a magic missile with a Damage of +4 that ignores armour and Toughness Bonus.
spell.name: Flensing Ruin

spell.description: Enemies cannot fly in the affected area and all ranged attacks in or out of it suffer a -10 penalty. Allies are not affected.
spell.name: Howling Warpgale

spell.description: Cast a magic missile with a Damage of +10. Damaged enemies also gain 1 Ablaze Condition and suffer from Minor Exposure to Corruption.
spell.name: Scorch

spell.description: Cast a magic missile with a Damage of +11. If the hit location is covered with metal armour, ignore AP and instead add it to the Damage. In case of Critical Success you also take a Damage +1 hit.
spell.name: Warp Lightning

spell.description: Gain +5 AP to all hit locations. Anyone that touches you takes a hit with Damage equal to 5 + your WP Bonus to the hit location used to touch you. This hit ignores AP from metal armour.
spell.name: Warp Shield

spell.description: Each round, all creatures in the AoE  take Damage +10 hit to the highest point of their body. This hit ignores AP from metal armour. Every round the caster may move the AoE by Willpower yards.
spell.name: Warp Storm

spell.description: Anyone within the AoE must pass a a Difficult (-10) Endurance Test or suffer a hit with Damage equal to your WP Bonus. This Damage ignores Toughness Bonus and AP. For each additional +2 SL, you can extend AoE by 1 yard.
spell.name: Pestilent Breath

spell.description: Create a pustule on your body. You can cut and drain it (deals 1 Wound) and coat a weapon with the fluid. If the coated weapon deals at least 1 Wound, the victim has to pass a Hard (-20) Endurance Test or suffer extra Wounds equal to your Willpower Bonus. Once drained, the fluid remains active for Willpower Bonus hours.
spell.name: Poisonous Pustule

spell.description: You can touch 1 weapon or 3 ammunition items.  The touched item causes a Poisoned Condition in addition to its normal damage.
spell.name: Bless with Filth

spell.description: Every character in the AoE counts as possessing the Infected Creature Trait.
spell.name: Bless with Filth - v2

spell.description: Every creature in the AoE must pass a Challenging (+0) Endurance Test or gain 1 Poisoned Condition. Your attacks gain Infected Creature Trait for the next  WP Bonus rounds.
spell.name: Cloud of Corruption

spell.description: You taint a piece of food or clothing with Black Plague.
spell.name: Mantle of Contagion

spell.description: You cause rot and decay in all food in the AoE. Anyone who eats it will suffer from Galloping Trots.
spell.name: Putrefy

spell.description: Starting from the next round, all creatures must pass a Difficult (-10) Toughness every round or loose 3 Wounds ignoring AP and T Bonus. Anyone who loses 6 or more Wounds, gains Unconscious Condition. As an action, you can move AoE within Willpower yards of your location.
spell.name: Toxic Rain

spell.description: Create a swarm of flies that surrounds you. Any other creature in the AoE receives a -20 penalty to all Tests. In addition, anyone trying to attack you using ranged skill receives -20 penalty.
spell.name: Veil of Flies

spell.description: Every Wound target receives counts as Minor Infection. All Endurance Tests to avoid Festering Wounds suffer a -10 penalty for each SL. Every time they receive Bleeding Condition, they receive 1 extra Bleeding Condition.
spell.name: Weeping Wound

spell.description: If the target fails Challenging (+0) Endurance Test, they lose 1 point of T for each SL. Creatures who lose all points are killed. Victims who survive regain 1 point per day of complete rest and additional 1d10 points if treated with healing capable of removing Critical Wounds.
spell.name: Wither

spell.description: Increase your Movement by WP Bonus. For every +2 SL, your Movement increases by an extra point.
spell.name: Swiftscamper

spell.description: Gain +1 AP to all locations and +20 to all Stealth Tests in dim light.
spell.name: Armour of Darkness

spell.description: Every round, you can move the whirlwind by up 10 yards without sacrificing an Action. Targets affected by the Black Whirlwind have to pass an a Challenging (+0) Endurance Test or suffer a -20 penalty on all WS, BS, and Ag, and Perception (involving eyesight) Tests for 1d10 minutes.
spell.name: Black Whirlwind

spell.description: You can walk over water or similar as if it was solid ground. In addition, you don't leave tracks when moving over soft surface such as mud or snow.
spell.name: Buoyant Passage

spell.description: Everyone in the AoE must make a successful Challenging (+0) Endurance Test or gain 1 Stunned and 1 Blinded Conditions for each level of failure. On a critical failure, they gain extra Stunned Condition. Does not affect anyone with Arcane Magic - Stealth Talent.
spell.name: Flash-Bang

spell.description: Your fur changed colour to match your surroundings. When perfectly still, you gain a +40 bonus to all Stealth Tests.
spell.name: Pelt of the Assassin

spell.description: Gain Wallcrawler Creature Trait.
spell.name: Stickypaws

spell.description: If the target dies while under the effects of Traceless Demise, its body and all equipment dissolve into black slime.
spell.name: Traceless Demise

spell.description: Enchant a number of Throwing Stars equal to your WP Bonus. Anyone hit by such star, must pass a Hard (-20) Toughness Test or suffer Wounds equal to your WP Bonus that ignores AP and T Bonus.
spell.name: Warp Star Infusion

spell.description: Gain Ethereal Trait.
spell.name: Spirit Walk

spell.description: You trick the target into thinking that you speak in regular manner.
spell.name: Cunnin' Words

spell.description: The targets gains 1 + SL  Fatigued Conditions.
spell.name: Gork'll Fix It

spell.description: Anyone in the AoE without Night Vision or Dark vision gains Blinded Condition. if they want to move, they must pass a Challenging (+0) Perception Test or gain Prone Condition.
spell.name: Night Shroud

spell.description: All hits made targets of this spell gain Impale and Penetrating Qualities.
spell.name: Sneaky Stabbin'
spell.target: Orc, Goblin, Snotling, and Hobgoblin allies within Range

spell.description: All enemies in the AoE are hit with magic missile with Damage +4. Anyone who takes damage, has to make a Challenging (+0) Cool Test or gain a Stunned Condition.
spell.name: Vindictive Glare

spell.description:
You cause creature or object to age and decay rapidly. A living creature must make a Challenging (+0) Toughness
Test or ages 2d10 years and permanently loses â€“1d10 from their WS, BS, S, T Ag, and Dex.
spell.name: Reveal the Inner Beauty

spell.description: Learning XP: 150. Bonds with Animal Familiar.
spell.name: Spirit-Bonding Ritual

spell.description: Fimir Marsh Magic Spell. All warm-blooded creatures are hit with +2 Damage at the end of each round and must make an Average (+20) Endurance Test or gain  Blinded and Fatigued Conditions.
spell.name: A Bite of Midges

spell.description: Fimir Marsh Magic Spell. Target gains one Entangled Condition with a Strength equal to your Int, plus 1 extra Entangled Condition for each + 2 SL. Each round, the target has to pass an Average (+20) Cool Test or gain a Fatigued Condition. The spell lasts until all Entangled Conditions are removed.
spell.name: Despondent Slough

spell.description: Fimir Marsh Magic Spell. Targets have to pass Easy (+40) Endurance Test or gain a Fatigued Condition. All Tests to shoot blackpowder weapons, cast spells from the Lore of Fire, or enter Frenzy suffer -2 SL.
spell.name: Inculcate Mizzle

spell.description: Fimir Marsh Magic Spell.Everyone in the affected area that do not have Arcane Magic (Shadows) Talent gains +1 Blinded, Deafened, and Fatigued Conditions which stay for the whole duration of the spell. Affected targets that try to move have to pass a Challenging (+0) Perception Test or receive Prone Condition.
spell.name: Mystic Mist

spell.description: Fimir Marsh Magic Spell. Stand one foot in water and the other on dry land. The edge of the marsh creeps outward across the Area of Effect.
spell.name: O Mere Be More

spell.description: Fimir Marsh Magic Spell. Target suffers from -3 SL to any Navigation Tests in the swamp area.
spell.name: Turned Around

spell.description: Target recovers WP Bonus of Wounds and gains Fear 1 Creature Trait. Special overcasting rules apply.
spell.name: Apotheosis

spell.description: Target suffers 1 Damage to the body for every 2 Armour Points worn. This Damage ignores APs. If you pass a Challenging (+0) Willpower Test, 1 randomly selected magic item in target's possession is destroyed. Special overcasting rules apply.
spell.name: Arcane Unforging

spell.description: Dispels all persistent spells in the AoE. Special overcasting rules apply.
spell.name: Drain Magic

spell.description: You make a mountain or hill shake. Everyone who is there has to pass a Very Hard (-30) Athletics Test at the start of their Round. If they fail, they gain a Prone Condition and cannot move or take any action. Special overcasting rules apply.
spell.name: Uproot the Mountains

spell.description: Targets gain Ethereal Creature Trait and their Movement Points are doubled. Special overcasting rules apply.
spell.name: Walk Between Worlds

spell.description:
Anyone on the leyline must pass a
Hard (-20) Endurance Test or suffer 15 Damage that ignores APs. Special overcasting rules apply.
spell.name: Earth Line

spell.description: Completely destroy 1 building. Anyone inside must pass a  Hard (-20) Dodge Test or suffers 20 Damage and is buried alive. Special overcasting rules apply.
spell.name: Ruination of Cities

spell.description:
Deal Int Bonus + 6 Damage to all targets in the AoE. This damage ignores APs. Deal extra 6 Damage to anyone with Daemonic or Undead Traits. Targets must pass an Average (+20)
Int Test or gain a Stunned Condition. Special overcasting rules apply.
spell.name: Mental Blast

spell.description: Give an allied Orc, Goblin, or Hobgoblin 1+SL Advantage points. All points maybe be given to a single target or distributed to many targets.
spell.name: Bash 'Em Lads!

spell.description: Magic Missile with a Damage of +1 that always hits head location. If the target has Aethyric Attunement or Second Sight Talents, the damage is +6 instead.
spell.name: 'Eadbutt!

spell.description: You drop anything you were holding and can only attack with your fists. You gain Melee - Brawling 55 and Weapon - Fists +9.
spell.name: Fists of Gork

spell.description: For each SL, you may give 1 allied Orc or Goblin Ward 10 Creature Trait. If they already have Ward x, this spell makes it Ward x-1. This cannot reduce Ward below 7.
spell.name: Mork Save Us!

spell.description: Summon a fog that reduces visibility to 10 yards. The fog is not magical and cannot be Dispelled.
spell.name: Shroud of Fog

spell.description: Target suffers a -10 to all Tests, and its Movement is halved.
spell.name: Itchy Nuisance

spell.description: All targets gain +1 Advantage and their weapons gain the Penetrating Quality for as long as they have Advantage.
spell.name: Sneaky Stabbin' - v2

spell.description: Creates a small magical flame that cannot be extinguished and does not need fuel.
spell.name: Ceaseless Flame

spell.description: Creates an area of warmth in an cold environment. Any Outdoor Survival Tests to make camp inside the area, can be no worse than Average (+20).
spell.name: Comfort

spell.description: Instantly cooks a meat, pot of stew or similar. If cast on a living creature, it's a magic missile dealing +3 Damage, which also inflicts one Stunned Condition on anything that can feel pain. If the location is an arm, the target has to pass a Challenging (+0) Endurance Test or drop whatever they are holding.
spell.name: Flashcook

spell.description: During the duration of this spell you can communicate with any birds, but you cannot communicate in any other language (you can only make bird sounds).
spell.name: Birdspeech

spell.description: You learn about the future weather in your location for the rest of the day and tomorrow. With +2SL you learn the weather for the following weak, with +4SL for the following month, and with +6SL for the rest of the season.
spell.name: Weathervane

spell.description: Summon a gale for WP Bonus Rounds. It extinguishes all torches and fires, and anything with Ablaze Conditions loses 1 Condition per Round. Targets must pass a Challenging (+0) Endurance Test or are sent flying 1d10 yards backwards and gain 1 Prone Condition. Alternatively summon a gentler wind for WP Bonus hours. It has no dramatic effect but can, for example, fill the sail for the duration of this spell.
spell.name: Gale

spell.description: Non-metal object behaves as if it was metal but its appearance does not change. The item gains all the usual Qualities and Flaws of a typical metal object of that sort. At the end of the spell roll 1d10. 1: the item is destroyed; 2-3: the item becomes degraded and torn; 4-10: no effect. Cannot be cast on already enchanted items.
spell.name: Rigor of Steel

spell.description: You can sense all metal within range of the spell as long as it is not hidden behind other metal. You can tell metal type, rough shape and precise location. For more details you must pass Challenging (+0) Perception Test.
spell.name: Sense Metal

spell.description: You learn the history of an metal object. For example when it was forged, any significant moments in its existence, and how it used during during the last day.
spell.name: Tale of Metal

spell.description: Heal WP Bonus +SL Wounds of any beast. Gain +20 to Charm Animal Tests of the healed beast.
spell.name: Beast Made Well

spell.description: Mark a beast. Other beasts will avoid it unless attacked. Anyone that passes a a Hard (-20) Intuition Test senses that this creature is protected and should not be harmed. Anyone who injures it suffers -10 Fel for the duration of this spell. In addition, other beasts of the same species will either avoid the abuser or be aggressive towards them.
spell.name: Cruelty's Deserts

spell.description: Target beast gains one of the following Creature Traits: Arboreal, Armour (2), Belligerent, Big, Bite (Strength Bonus +1), Clever, Fast, Fear (10), Fury, Magical, or Weapon (Strength Bonus +2). For each +SL, you may choose one more Trait.
spell.name: Wyssan's Ally

spell.description: You make a call to a specific species of beasts. The call conveys a simple message, for example "food here".
spell.name: Wildercall

spell.description: Cast on any material that could normally be fermented or beneficially aged, this spell brings it to the peak of suitability for consumption. To create high quality version, you must pass an appropriate Trade Test as well.
spell.name: Ferment

spell.description: You can deposit a small creature or an object (1 Enc) into the foliage of any tree. The target vanishes into another realm of existence. You can then later cast this spell again on any other tree of the same species to retrieve the object. Creatures cannot be retrieved. The object can have +1 Enc for each SL.
spell.name: Timbervault

spell.description: Let's you track any creature in natural, rural environment. Make a  Track Test with +2SL Bonus. If succeeded, you can track any creature that has passed withing WP Bonus yards. The spell lasts as long as you are tracking one single set of tracks. You lose the trail when the creature enters urban environment or crosses an artificial road.
spell.name: Track's Tale Told

spell.description: Restores the object to its original pristine state. If cast on a living being, it restores its clothing and cleans it. Leaving creatures suffer 1 Wound for each Corruption point they posses.
spell.name: Cleansing Glow

spell.description: Make an object disgusting for any creature the Daemonic or Undead Traits, or anyone with 3 or more Corruption points. They need to pass an opposed Cool Test resisted by the observer's Intuition or be visibly repulsed.
spell.name: Disgust

spell.description:
Makes a source of light much stronger than it normally is. If cast in a dark environment, on the first round, anyone without Arcane
Magic - Light Talent looking at the source has to pass a Challenging (+0) Initiative Test to close their eyes, or receive a Blinded Condition.
spell.name: Illuminate

spell.description: Can be cast of a living creature or one that has just died. For the duration of the spell the creature stays alive as long as they take no further damage. Stops damage from Bleeding Conditions.
spell.name: Stay Death's Hand

spell.description: The target can sense Shyish Wind of Magic and see spirits. If the have not been warned about the effects of the spell, they must make a Challenging (+0) Cool Test or gain one Broken Condition.
spell.name: Deathsight

spell.description: Can target a large food container, vehicle, or building. Prevents the perishables form getting spoiled and other objects are protected from wear and tear and environmental damage.
spell.name: Preservation

spell.description: Can target object of up to 70 Enc. This spell makes it look either immensely valuable or completely worthless. Anyone with  Second Sight Talent who inspects the object, must pass a Hard (-20) Intuition Test to detect it has been enchanted.
spell.name: Shadows of Splendour

spell.description: You can conceal your real action with a fake action. For example, you might look like you are reading a book while in reality you are putting it in your bag. This spell does not change your location or masks/create new sounds. People interacting with you make Challenging (+0) Intuition Test to realise that something unnatural is happening.
spell.name: Cloak Activity

spell.description: You plunge the area in darkness. It's impossible to see through it and anything that steps out of it receives 3 Blinded Conditions.
spell.name: Pall of Darkness

spell.description: Create atmosphere of mistrust and hatred. Everyone in AoE suffers -10 to all Fellowship Tests and any Prejudice Psychology becomes Hatred instead.
spell.name: Badwill

spell.description: Reduce the healing time for a Broken Bone injury by 1d10 days, plus an additional 1d10 days for each +SL.
spell.name: Bonesetter

spell.description: Cleanses the target of most forms of harmful magic.
spell.name: Cleanslate

spell.description: Ensure that the next harvest will be at least average regardless of circumstances. They usual pay for this is 1/20 of the yield.
spell.name: Fertilise

spell.description: Allows you to track an item that binds a ghost to the mortal realm. You need to make an extended Difficult (-10) Navigate Test to follow the trail, with each Test requiring an hour, and a total of between 5 and 15 SL being required to succeed.
spell.name: Fetterfetch

spell.description: Creates a spirit repelling mixture. Smearing in on an entrance bars spirits from entering unless they pass a Hard (-20) Willpower. When used on weapon, the weapon counts as magic for the purpose of harming ghosts and undead. If used against undead that can be damaged with normal weapons, this mixture gives the weapon Damaging Quality. The effect ends immediately if the weapon gets in contact with blood.
spell.name: Geistbane

spell.description: Creates a fire that cannot be extinguished. This fire grants +20 to all Endurance Tests to resist cold weather. Spoiled or poisoned food cooked over this fire becomes safe to eat.
spell.name: Kindle

spell.description: Prepare a 1 + SL doses of powder. This powder has to be consumed (usually in a drink) by target(s) before the spell duration expires. It allows you yo control their dream next time they sleep.
spell.name: Onerion

spell.description: Has to be cast on a container of strong alcohol. Anyone who consumes it, automatically passes the first Fear Test they need to take.
spell.name: Stout Spirit

spell.description: Must be cast on a bowl of broth. After consuming it, the target ignores all Fatigued Conditions gained by tiredness for the duration of the spell.
spell.name: Trankraft

spell.description:
Enchant a single item of jewellery. It brings bad luck to its wearer. The wearer receives -10 to all Gamble Tests, -10 to Tests to resist any
kind of harmful magic, and +20 on the severity rolls for all Critical Wounds.
spell.name: Woecharm

spell.description: Select a spirit. The  spirit will perform one task requested by you. It will demand something in return.
spell.name: Godspakt

spell.description:
You make a creature with Daemonic or Undead Trait to lose interest in you. If the creature's WP is equal of higher than yours you must win Opposed Cool Test for the spell to work, otherwise it works automatically.
The creature chooses nearest viable target instead, but you might direct it to a specific target if you have present the creature with a memento of that person.
spell.name: Banishment of BÃ¶l

spell.description: You take a stone from a crumbling structure. You can throw it as Rock or used as Improvised Weapon. If it inflicts at least one Wound, that target must pass a Difficult (-10) Endurance Test, or suffer a Broken Bone (Minor). The spell expires after inflicting one Broken Bone.
spell.name: Bonesnapper

spell.description: Target loses 1 + SL Bleeding Conditions. For each one you may inflict a Fatigued Condition. If you do, the target must pass a Challenging (+0) Endurance Test or gain Unconscious Condition.
spell.name: Congeal

spell.description: Your target must make a Hard (-20) Cool Test. If they fail, you may choose the next words they will speak. You cannot force them to talk, but when they do chose to talk they will say what you want. The effect lasts for 1 sentence.
spell.name: Curse of the Treacherous Tongue

spell.description: The target looses 1 Fortune point. They must make a Hard (-20) Endurance Test. If they fail, they cannot gain any new Fortune points until the spellâ€™s duration has passed.
spell.name: Fatethief

spell.description: With a sample of target's blood (no older than 1 day) you can track them for the duration of the spell.
spell.name: Lodestone

spell.description:
Opens a portal in a mirror or similar reflective surface. The portal leads to a void. Anyone trapped there must pass Challenging (+0)
Endurance Test each day or vanish forever. A second casting of this spell may open the portal again to bring them back.
spell.name: Mirrored Abyss

spell.description: For the curse to take effect the victim must fail a Challenging (+0) Willpower Test. If the do, everyone around them feel suspicious about them. The target suffers  -20 to Fellowship based Tests to interact with others. Anyone with Second Sight Talent will see a cloud of Dhar around the cursed target.
spell.name: Outcast's Curse

spell.description: Agree to a pact with a willing target. From now on, both of you must adhere to the terms as best of your ability. Whoever breaks  terms suffers from the following effects until they make amends. Any loss of Wounds causes a Bleeding Condition. Any time the victim would gain a Fatigued Condition, they gain two instead. The victim must add 40 to the results of any Critical Wound severity test.
spell.name: Pactbind

spell.description: If the target fail a Hard (-20) Cool Test, they must roll for a Critical Wound even though they do not take any damage. For the duration of the spell they feel all effects of the wound.
spell.name: Painjar

spell.description:
You walk a path and make it impossible for anyone
else to follow. For the duration of the spell, the path is incomprehensible to anyone else.
spell.name: Wayward Path

spell.description: Summon a daemon. After successful casting, make a Challenging (+0) Cool Test, roll 1d10 and add both numbers. -5 or worse: A greater daemon's hand drags you into its realm. -4 to -0: A hostile Lesser Daemon or a powerful spirit. 0 to 4: A neutral Lesser Daemon or a powerful spirit. 5 to 9: A favourable Lesser Daemon or a powerful spirit. 10 or better: A Greater Daemon with an interest in speaking with you.
spell.name: Nameless Summons

spell.description: The Butcher and all friendly Ogres in AoE gain Hatred against a target (or group of targets) the Butcher chose.
spell.name: Bilebrew

spell.description: Make an Easy (+40) Endurance Test. You heal 1 + SL Wounds. If you fail the Test, gain Bloody Flux.
spell.name: Bloodgruel

spell.description: All Ogres in AoE ignore any Broken Conditions.
spell.name: Get Some Guts

spell.description:
You must make a Challenging (+0) Endurance Test. If you fail, lose 1 tooth for every -1 SL. If you pass, you and all friendly Ogres in AoE gain +20 to Endurance
and Cool Tests, and + 1 AP to all Hit Locations.
spell.name: Toothcracker

spell.description: The target gains Hatred towards all enemies, may ignore all negative effects of Conditions and Diseases, and gain +2 SL to any Toughness based Tests.
spell.name: 'Ard as Nails

spell.description: Target gains Prone and Stunned Conditions. Also gains 1 Stunned Condition for every +1 SL. If they suffer more Stunned Conditions than their Toughness Bonus, they must pass an Average (+20) Cool Test or suffer Critical Hit to the head.
spell.name: Brainbursta

spell.description: All Orc allies in the AoE gain +2 Advantage for all Melee Tests.
spell.name: 'Ere We Go!

spell.description: All targets in the AoE suffer 8+SL Damage every Round and must pass a Challenging (+0) Endurance Test or receive an Ablaze Condition every Round.
spell.name: The Evil Sun

spell.description: All targets in the AoE gain Prone Condition. They must make a Difficult (-10) Dodge Test. If they pass, they receive 4 Damage (ignores AP) to random hit location, otherwise they receive 8 Damage.
spell.name: Foot of Gork

spell.description: Any living creature on a straight line in the direction of the blast is hit by a Damage +4 magic missile. It also damages buildings with 65 or less Toughness.
spell.name: Gaze of Mork

spell.description: A giant hand scoops 1d10 targets (must be within Willpower Bonus yards of each other) and puts them down somewhere within range. The targets gain +1 Advantage.
spell.name: The Hand of Gork

spell.description: Target Orc, Hobgoblin, or Goblin gains Ward 10 Creature Trait. If they already have a Ward Trait, it improves by 1. It cannot be improved to 7 or better in this way.
spell.name: Mork Save Us!

spell.description: All targets in the AoE t gain 1 Advantage for specific use on Melee and Ranged Tests. It also removes any Broken Conditions and gives +2 SL to Cool and Endurance Tests.
spell.name: WAAAGH!
spell.target: AoE (Willpower yards) all Orcs, Hobgoblins, and Goblins within range

spell.description:
Any accompanying Squig, Giant Wolf, Spider, or Snotling will follow the Shamanâ€™s
commands with the discipline of a well-trained dog.
spell.name: Behave!

spell.description: Enemies in the AoE cannot use their Fortune Points and gain 1 Fatigued Condition.
spell.name: Curse of Da Bad Moon

spell.description: All allies in the AoE gain Venom Trait with  Challenging (+0) potency. If they already have the Venom Trait, it becomes Difficult (-10) potency.
spell.name: Gift of the Spider-God
spell.target: Forest Goblins in AoE (Willpower Bonus yards)

spell.description: The targets gains 1 Fatigued Condition.
spell.name: Gork'll Fix It - v2

spell.description: Whenever a friendly Goblin (or Hobgoblin if the Shaman is a Hobgoblin)  in the AoE successfully hits an enemy, it counts as a Critical Hit.
spell.name: The Great Green Spite

spell.description: Target suffers a -1 SL to all Test. If they are wearing metal armour, the penalty is increased to -2 SL.
spell.name: Itchy Nuisance - v2

spell.description: A giant hand tries to lift the target. The target must win an Opposed Strength Test against a Strength of 80. If they lose, they suffer 10 Damage to the body location and then dropped from 2d10 yards.
spell.name: Mork Wants Ya!

spell.description: The Shaman conjures pair of hands that can pickpocket with Sleight of Hand skill of 55. On successful theft, the target may make a Challenging (+0) Perception to see the hands and that they are flying back to the Shaman.
spell.name: Nikkit!

spell.description: All hits made targets in the AoE gain Impale and Penetrating Qualities.
spell.name: Sneaky Stabbin' - v3
spell.target: AoE (Willpower Bonus yards) Orcs and Goblins

spell.description: All enemies in the AoE are hit with magic missile with Damage +4. Anyone who takes damage, has to make a Challenging (+0) Cool Test or gain Stunned Condition.
spell.name: Vindictive Glare - v2

talent.description:
For your Action make an Opposed Melee/Melee Test. If succeeded, the following can happen:
0 - 1 SL: Opponent loses weapon which flies 1d10 feet in random direction
2- 3 SL: As above, but you determine the distance
4 - 5 SL: YOu also determine the direction
6+ SL: You may chose to take opponent's weapon if you have a free hand
This Talent cannot be used against opponents with no weapons, or with Size larger than you.
talent.name: Disarm

talent.description:
Rapidly talking nonsense without letting other interrupt you. 
Lets you attempt Opposed Charm/Intelligence Test. Success gives 1 Stunned Condition for each level of Blather.
If you stop talking, the affected person loses all Stunned Conditions right away. You attempt this one per person.
talent.name: Blather

talent.description: Once per session you, you may take a secret Intelligence Test to get information about a political situation or entangled web of social connections. GM will provide you the information based on your SL.
talent.name: Schemer

talent.description:
When Earning (during play or performing Income Endeavour), if you have an  employer, you can do a Opposed Intelligence Test. If you win gain 2d10 + SL brass pennies, 1d10 + SL silver shillings, or 1 + SL gold
crowns (depending on the size of the business). If your employer wins by 6+ SL, you still gain the money but you are detected.
talent.name: Embezzle

talent.description: If your weapon has the Fast quality, you can do Damage when being attacked. During a Round, you can riposte number of attack equal you the level of Riposte Talent.
talent.name: Riposte

talent.description:
An Intuition Test allows you to spot other trying to stir up trouble or hurt you. If potential troublemakers are trying to conceal their intentions, this Test is Opposed. The GM may take this Test  on your behalf so you might not know if it succeeded or not.
If the detected troublemakers start combat, you do not get a Surprised Condition.
talent.name: Nose for Trouble

talent.description: The advantage cost of the Flee from Harm action is reduced to 1.
talent.name: Relentless

talent.description: Add level of this Talent to SL of any Extended Test to reload a Blackpowder weapon. Reloading a ranged weapon in combat now counts as Assess action. Gain +1 Advantage when making Assess Test to Reload.
talent.name: Gunner

talent.description: You perceive  Winds of Magic and its influence with all your senses.
talent.name: Second Sight
talent.tests: Any Test to detect the Winds of Magic

talent.description: If you are approaching a dangerous situation, GM may take a secret Intuition Test for you. If successful, your GM will warn you and you don't get Surprised condition when attacked.
talent.name: Sixth Sense
talent.tests: Intuition Tests involving your Sixth Sense

talent.description: Allows to act like you belong among Engineer Guilders.
talent.name: Etiquette - Guilder - Engineer

talent.description: Allows to act like you belong among Servants.
talent.name: Etiquette - Servants

talent.description: You may now memorise spells from The Lore of Beasts.
talent.name: Arcane Magic - Beasts

talent.description: You may now memorise spells from The Lore of Shadow.
talent.name: Arcane Magic - Shadow

talent.description: You are remarkable at resisting hunger. You can survive on half of normal amount of food without any penalties. In addition, when starving, you need to test for Starvation every 3 days instead of every 2.
talent.name: Stone Soup

talent.description: You may now empower miracles of Ulric - God of War.
talent.name: Invoke - Ulric

talent.description: Allows to act like you belong among members of a guild.
talent.name: Etiquette - Guilder

talent.description: Gain +1 Damage with Miracles for each level of this Holy Hatred.
talent.name: Holy Hatred

talent.description: You can Feint for you Action against an opponent using a weapon.  If you win Opposed Melee (Fencing)/Melee Test and perform attack before the end of the next Round, add your Feint SL to the attack roll.
talent.name: Feint

talent.description:
When in rural area, you are automatically able to hunt enough game to feed yourself and number of others equal the level of this Talent (given time and equipment).
You can get additional food using normal foraging rules.
talent.name: Hunterâ€™s Eye
talent.tests: Any Test to trail or capture game

talent.description:
When in proximity of a large body of water, you are automatically able to fish enough to feed yourself and number of others equal the level of this Talent (given time and equipment).
 You can get additional food using normal foraging rules.
talent.name: Fisherman

talent.description: Whenever you are a target of a spell (positive or negative) the SL of any spell affecting you is reduced by 2 per level of Magic Resistance. The SL is reduced by the highest Magic Resistance in the area. You cannot learn the following Talents: Arcane Magic, Bless, Invoke, Petty Magic, and Witch!.
talent.name: Magic Resistance

talent.description: You Know a number of pieces of information equal to level of this Talent about the associated Lore without taking the Lore Skill Test.
talent.name: Savant

talent.description: Add the Trade - Explosives Skill to any Career you enter. If the Career already has that Trade - Explosives, you can obtain it for 5 XP fewer per Advance.
talent.name: Craftsman - Explosives

talent.description: You may now empower miracles of Taal - God of the Wild.
talent.name: Invoke - Taal

talent.description: Allows to take Perception Test to detect barely detectable sounds or tone differences.
talent.name: Acute Sense - Hearing

talent.description: Battle Rage lets you attempt to end Frenzy state at the end of each round (Cool Test).
talent.name: Battle Rage

talent.description: Reduce or increase prices by an extra 10% when Haggling.
talent.name: Dealmaker

talent.description: Add Accurate Shot level to Damage with all ranged weapons.
talent.name: Accurate Shot

talent.description: When lying using Charm, opponents cannot use Intuition to detect that you are lying.
talent.name: Cat-tongued

talent.description:
When Earning or during Income Endeavour add the following per Talent level:
Career Level 1, +2d10 bp
Career Level 2, +1d10 ss
Career Level 3, +2d10 ss
Career Level 4, +1 gc
You have visible signs you are a criminal, and others without Criminal Talent consider you lower Status.
Authorities are always suspicious of you (increasingly with the level of this Talent).
GM can agree to remove levels of this Talent for the same XP it cost to buy.
talent.name: Criminal

talent.description: If you wish, you have a Fear Rating equal to the level of Frightening.
talent.name: Frightening

talent.description: You attempt an Average (+20%) Intuition Test to sense the Winds of Magic in others. Scoring an Astounding Success (+6) reveals target's highest Channeling Specialization.
talent.name: Magical Sense

talent.description: Add +1 Damage for each level of This Talent when damaging inanimate objects.
talent.name: Break and Enter
talent.tests: Melee when forcing or breaking inanimate objects

talent.description:
Others can only Oppose your Sleight of Hand Test (with Perception) if they suspect you and are actively looking for your movements.
If you use your Melee (Brawling) to touch an opponent, you get a bonus of +10 times the level of Fast Hands.
talent.name: Fast Hands
talent.tests: Sleight of Hand, Melee (Brawling) to touch an opponent

talent.description: When falling you take a Athletics Test. If succeeded, Reduce the distance fallen by 1 + SL yards when calculating Damage.
talent.name: Catfall

talent.description: When Fleeing or Running using an animal, add +1 Movement to it.
talent.name: Crack the Whip
talent.tests: Drive or Ride Tests when Fleeing or Running

talent.description: After successfully using Charm on those attracted to you, you may chose to use the number on the unit die as the SL of the Charm Test.
talent.name: Attractive
talent.tests: Charm Tests to influence those attracted to you

talent.description: Permanent +5 bonus to Weapon Skill Characteristic (WS) that does not count towards Advances.
talent.name: Warrior Born

talent.description: Every time you take this Talent, you can create an unique piece of art with one of you Art or  Trade Skills. Such item will be an extraordinary achievement in its class an will provide bonus to Fellowship Tests from people that know you made it. It will have 10 times or more of its usual value.
talent.name: Magnum Opus

talent.description: You know a number of pieces of information equal to the level of this Talent about the  chosen Local area without taking the Lore - Local Test.
talent.name: Savant - Local

talent.name: Craftsman - Apothecary

talent.description:
On encountering a member of Greenskins, you must attempt a Psychology Test. If failed you are subject to Hatred. You can attempt Psychology Test at the end of every subsequent Round to stop the Hatred.
While subject to Hatred, you must attack the Greenskins. You gain +1 SL to all combat Tests versus them and you are immune to Fear and Intimidate (but not Terror) caused by the Greenskins.
talent.name: Hatred - Greenskins

talent.description: Allows to act like you belong among Nobles.
talent.name: Etiquette - Nobles

talent.description: You may memorise spells from your chosen Lore. The XP cost of memorising a new spell depends on the number of spell already known: new spell cost = round down("number of spells known" / "Int Bonus" + 1) * 100 XP. Normally you cannot learn more than one Arcane Magic Lore.  Having this Talent also prevents you from having Bless and Invoke Talents. You can unlearn Arcane Magic for 100 XP but you will lose all spells.
talent.name: Arcane Magic

talent.description: You may now memorise spells from The Lore of Witchcraft.
talent.name: Arcane Magic - Witchcraft

talent.description: Allows to act like you belong among River Pilot Guilders.
talent.name: Etiquette - Guilder - River Pilot

talent.description: Ignore all movement penalties when moving through Marshes.
talent.name: Strider - Marshes

talent.description: When Earning (during play or performing Income Endeavours) gain +1 gold crown per level of Wealthy.
talent.name: Wealthy

talent.description: When rolling on a Critical Damage table, make two rolls and choose which result you prefer.
talent.name: Strike to Injure

talent.description: Reduce Damage taken by +1 for each level of  this Talent. Damage can only be reduced to 1 (you always take at least 1 Damage).
talent.name: Robust

talent.description: Increase your maximum Resolve pool by the level of this Talent.
talent.name: Strong-minded

talent.description: Add the level of this Talent to SL in any Opposed Strength Test. In addition, you can carry extra points of Encumbrance equal to the level of Strong Back.
talent.name: Strong Back

talent.description: You can carry extra points of Encumbrance equal to twice the level of Sturdy.
talent.name: Sturdy

talent.description:
You can perfectly identify and reproduce any tones or notes  without attempting a Test. 
Add the Entertain - Sing to any Career you enter. If the Career already has that Trade Skill, you can obtain the Skill for 5 XP fewer per Advance.
talent.name: Perfect Pitch
talent.tests: Entertain (Sing), Language (Tonal Languages, such as Eltharin, Cathayan, and Magick)

talent.description: If you fail a Consume Alcohol Test, you may reverse the die roll if that lets you succeed.
talent.name: Carouser
talent.tests: Charm at Parties, Gossip at Parties, Consume Alcohol

talent.description: Ignore all penalties when Testing Sail using sea vessels. You count as two, towards the minimum required number of crew members to operate a sea ship.

talent.name: Sure Shot

talent.name: Cardsharp

talent.name: Pure Soul

talent.description:
You are resistant to sea sickness.
Under regular conditions at sea, you do not need a Test to resist Sea Sickness.
Under special circumstances, you can ignore all penalties to Tests to resist Sea Sickness.
talent.name: Sea Legs
talent.tests: All those taken to resist Sea Sickness

talent.description:
When publicly speaking to a crowd of people, you can influence many more people with your Charm Skill than usual. Level 1 - As normal x 5
Level 2 - As normal x 10
Level 3 - As normal x 20
Level 4 - As normal x 50
Level 5 - As normal x 100
Level 6 - As normal x 200
Level 7 - As normal x 500
Level 8 - As normal x 1000
Level 9 - Everyone you can reach with your voice
talent.name: Public Speaker

talent.description: For your Action, you can choose to Beat Blade before rolling. Perform a Melee Test, if successful, the opposing Advantage Pool loses  1 Advantage, and loses a further 1 if you score 6 SL. This Test is not Opposed. This Talent is of no use if your opponent has no weapon, or has a larger Size than you.
talent.name: Beat Blade

talent.description: When using the Intimidate Skill, add +1 SL for each level of this Talent.

talent.name: Strike to Stun

You can use Perform and Dodge Skills while mounted without any penalties.
In combat, you can Move at the beginning of the Round (outside of normal Initiative order).

talent.description:
When at war, you can use Leadership to inspire many more of you subordinate soldiers than usual.
Level 1 - As normal x 5
Level 2 - As normal x 10
Level 3 - As normal x 20
Level 4 - As normal x 50
Level 5 - As normal x 100
Level 6 - As normal x 200
Level 7 - As normal x 500
Level 8 - As normal x 1000
Level 9 - Everyone you can reach with your voice
talent.name: Inspiring

You have one or more (equal to the level of this Talent) secret identities. Each identity has a Career associated with it. While posing as your secret identity you can use that identity's Social Status for Fellowship Tests. It lets you ignore Criminal Talent if you have one.
It requires  Entertain - Acting Test every time you interact with someone that can see through your act.

talent.description: Pass automatically the first test against associated threat. The SL of such test is your TB.

On encountering a member of Outlaws, you must attempt a Psychology Test. If failed you are subject to Hatred. You can attempt Psychology Test at the end of every subsequent Round to stop the Hatred.
While subject to Hatred, you must attack the Outlaws. You gain +1 SL to all combat Tests versus them and you are immune to Fear and Intimidate (but not Terror) caused by the Outlaws.

talent.name: Commanding Presence

talent.name: Shieldsman

talent.description: Ignore all movement penalties when moving in the specified terrain.

On encountering a member of Hatred group, you must attempt a Psychology Test. If failed you are subject to Hatred. You can attempt Psychology Test at the end of every subsequent Round to stop the Hatred.
While subject to Hatred, you must attack the hated group members. You gain +1 SL to all combat Tests versus that group and you are immune to Fear and Intimidate (but not Terror) caused by them.
